name: Umbra
description: Umbra is a fantasy-style game that is story-driven with Metroid-Vania style elements, encouraging world exploration and discovery. Dive into an unforgiven world and discover the secrets behind an abandoned kingdom, and its mysterious and deceiving ruler.

name: Look Back
description: Look Back is a side-scrolling platformer where you enter the mind of a man, facing yourself in a journey of self-discovery.

name: Mystic Gals
description: In this adventure you play as one of three heroines. Where you must Battle, Survive, and Collect Creatures to aid you in battles. All for a chance at taking arms against an evil sorceress known as "The Great Creator". Do you have what it takes bring her evil to an end?

name: Take Cover Now
description: In the early morning hours of June 3rd, 1998, modest jazz radio station WSKC intercepts an Emergency Alert - but it's not your average thunderstorm warning. Take Cover Now is an analog horror game exploring a frightening prospect: what happens when bad actors use our safety systems against us?

name: Mythfall
description: Mythfall is a free 2d browser "bullet hell" game developed by UnitOfTime.

name: BOPZ.io
description: From the creators of ZOMBS ROYALE: Play the ultimate top-down 2D shooter, BOPZ.io! Engage in intense 5v5 battles, planting and defusing bombs while outsmarting your opponents. Your role impacts your team's success, and their success shapes your experience. Prefer solo action? Go solo in various game modes that will test your skills. Jump into the fast-paced chaos and dominate the battlefield!

name: ChainStaff
description: ChainStaff is a brutal action-platformer with a transforming spear and grappling hook, blazing weapon upgrades, and a rocking soundtrack. Aliens have taken over the Earth! Swing, shoot, and spear your way through hordes of mutating monstrosities and bone-shaking boss fights.

name: Yooka-Replaylee
description: Embark on an epic open-world 3D platforming collectathon adventure with Yooka and Laylee! The search for Pagies starts anew in Yooka-Replaylee, the enhanced definitive version of the beloved indie darling with all new challenges, secrets, mechanics, and accessibility options.

name: Wrekless
description: Wrekless is our love letter to skateboarding culture. Play with up to 50 skaters online, pull off crazy tricks, chain combos, and defy gravity. Simultaneously skate and build skateparks and minigames together with other skaters in real-time, and share them with the community.

name: Akıllı Çay Bardağı
description: Akıllı Çay Bardağı is an AI-based guessing game. It tries to find out the object that you have in mind with an average of 20 questions.

name: WalkScape
description:
WalkScape is a game inspired by some old school MMORPGs. But this game has one major trick up its sleeve: you don't play actively, but instead gain progress by walking.

You can expect a fun and exciting journey through the World of Arenum while also having the motivation to walk!

name: Lost Legions
description: Lost in the Teutoburg Forest after a historical catastrophic defeat, survive as a Roman soldier in a world filled with danger. Craft, build, explore and fight in this story-rich open-world adventure. Unearth secrets of a forgotten time, alone or with up to 3 friends, in a land where history lingers.

name: Nulandia
description: A dynamic metaverse to explore, create, and compete. Build and trade virtual real estate, adopt pets, and design unique avatars. Engage in games like Robot Races and Sunset Surfing, utilize AI tools for art and more, and enjoy activities such as beach cinema. Earn Nu and real-life prizes.

name: Project V: Origins
description: Humanity's last chance against evil.

name: SporeBloom
description: Mushroom science meets Turn-Based Strategy in a multiplayer battle for fitness. Spread underground networks and grow fantastical mushrooms. Parasitize your opponents or peacefully scour the map for food and amass impressive networks.

name: Laniakea
description: Laniakea, an immersive MMORPG, invites you to shape a dynamic world through player-driven economy and classless combat. Explore a vast realm, build wealth, forge alliances, and leave your legacy through thrilling PvP. Your choices will echo through the ages in this unforgettable adventure.

name: Ronin Rush
description: "Dive into a fast-paced 3D adventure, dodging obstacles, slashing enemies, and conquering epic bosses. Explore vibrant environments and experience exhilarating gameplay and save your village by retrieving the energy stone!"

name: Coastal Kingdoms
description: Build and explore in this tile placing citybuilding roguelite!

name: Souptown Matty
description: Souptown Matty is a story-based mystery-solving dog simulator. Around the time when spirits linger, an unexpected visitor comes and steals your owner's beloved necklace. It's time to take action on your own and start investigating.

name: Oh, Flock!
description: After a strange series of events you find yourself shoved into the role of a Shephard on a very peculiar farm! With only your wits and trusty cursor by your side guide your flock of sheep through a series of environments filled with a variety of obstacles and predators!

name: Extermination 1
description: Find the most efficient way to reduce the infected population in casual rogue-lite game Extermination 1. Adapt. Overcome. There are no limits stopping you from snowballing in this reverse bullet hell.

name: Find Brains
description: Find Brains — action-adventure game with platformer elements. Long-forgotten and forbidden magic began to return to the world. Go on an adventure with slime Kevin and his friend Elis to restore him to his former power!

name: Dr. Murph
description: Embark on an erotic intergalactic adventure with the clumsy Dr. Murph and his hot assistant, Repa. Meet other women from a myriad of alien races - and, if you plays your cards right, you might just end up getting lucky!

name: Phantom Xcape
description: Step into 'Phantom Xcape' and become an international spy in a thrilling first-person stealth action game. Use advanced stealth tactics and espionage tools to navigate through challenging missions and make critical decisions that impact the story.

name: Dart The Dog
description: A fast-paced platformer built around gaining speed and momentum.

name: Void Carrier
description: This game is a difficult puzzle game with many worlds that each have their own gimmicks!

name: Spoop Troop
description: Spoop Troop is a 2-4 player couch co-op/pvp asymmetric casual horror game. Got it? Good! Now get in the van - we're busting ghosts!

name: SimplePlanes 2
description: Your favorite sim, evolved! Build planes, cars, tanks, or anything you want! Download community crafts for free. New parts, new environments, multiplayer mayhem, endless sandbox fun, and more.

name: Galix: NewHorizons
description: In a distant future where human civilization has crumbled, Earth has become a pristine new world teeming with life. In this open-world ARPG, play as the the courageous Hailey and set out on a journey filled with mystery and adventure. Begin your own fantastical journey as you chase the unknown.

name: Thieves of Dingirra
description: In this strategy/RPG game, assume the role of the Master Thief, establish a Thieves Guild in Dingirra, recruit NPCs, grow in power, delve into your companions' pasts, and maybe even develop romantic relationships with them. All while aiming to fully conquer the town of Dingirra.

name: Barako the Pirate
description: A pirate themed rpg adventure!

name: BaroMaro
description: BaroMaro is a top-down arena hack'n slash rogue-lite featuring hundreds of unique perk cards to collect. Using different weapons, elements and playstyles, OBLITERATE animal kingdom and reunite with your family once more...

name: Augurium Mortis
description: A distant world in a dystopian future, separated from her squad Amy Sol finds herself being ambushed by enemy forces looking for revenge. Pilot her nimble hovercraft to blow up as many mechs as possible in this fast-paced arena top-down shooter.

name: Aztlán Codex: El códice de los ancestros
description: Aztlán Codex: Join Sarah Martinez on an epic hack and slash adventure with platforming. Explore mystical worlds, battle deities, and uncover ancient secrets. Find all six volumes of the Codex and change reality. Are you up for the challenge?

name: A Tithe in Blood
description: A dark yuri visual novel, about a quiet university student who discovers blood magic in the depths of her grief. Stepping into a world she little understands, Honoka finds unexpected love, and inadvertantly sets in motion a deadly series of events.

name: Asteros
description: Asteros is a Sci-Fi third person action rogue-like where intense gunfights and complex combat await. Sent to eliminate an unknown threat in a research facility on the titular planet, you'll encounter hostile forces and uncover hidden dangers as you fight to secure humanity's future.

name: Astera
description: Step into Astera, a steampunk-infused fantasy world. Play your way in this fast-paced Action RPG featuring dual class specialization, rogue-like dungeons, a vast open world to explore and co-operative multiplayer. Crafted with passion by a dedicated team of action RPG enthusiasts.

name: A Stranded Spark
description: Explore the Forgotten Island in this small open-world cozy adventure game! Follow the story of Guina walking around the island, meeting new characters, helping them and trying to find a way back home through a wholesome and cute story.

name: A Chronicle of Occultism in Skinnerburg
description: "A Chronicle of Occultism in Skinnerburg" is a text adventure game that attempts to explore the possibilities of combining literature and gaming by driving gameplay through character building and environmental interactions and by hosting the narrative experience in novelistic and poetic texts. Explore Skinnerburg, a place where witchcraft traditions coexist with modern life, and interact with a wide variety of environments and characters, triggering literary and readable poetic texts, building character personalities and idiosyncratic tendencies, and experiencing the joy of maneuvering through a unique point-and-click combat and interaction system.

name: Aberrant Nights
description: Aberrant Nights is a first-person psychological horror game. The protagonist will travel to a suburban gas station in the middle of the night to become a part-time gas station worker.

name: 2351: Apocalypsis
description: Fight against humanity. This 3d mech brawler pits you against 6 opponents before you face the ultimate boss. Use your weapon, rockets and melee abilities to defeat your opponents across 6 stages.

name: 100 Egypt Cats
description: Join the cutest adventure in Egypt, full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of Egypt locations as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game.

name: Middle Ages: Peasants & Knights
description: Survive in an open world inspired by 14th century Europe. Immerse yourself in crafting based on real historical methods and experience true inventory system and realistic resource management. Take control of your destiny and embrace a world full of possibilities.

name: Forgotten 23
description: Space station Forgotten is in a decaying orbit and engineer Max Novak is the only hope of averting catastrophe with only 23 minutes and endless time loops to spare. Navigate a dark sci-fi adventure, learn more with every loop, solve challenging problems, and uncover the dark secret of the Forgotten.

name: SkyCop
description: Welcome to the year 2080! The number of unemployed and criminals is skyrocketing, but we won't let it happen. This is where Project SkyCop comes in - an elite unit of police officers who can take on anything.

name: Eversiege
description: Eversiege is a roguelike, tower defense in which you'll defend a castle in procedurally generated terrain. Establish a production, build defending buildings and survive waves of enemies coming from everywhere! After defeat, buy new buildings, unlock new leaders and prepare to fight again.

name: The Book of Warriors 2: Reborn
description: "The Book of Warriors 2: Reborn" is a roguelike game blending deep narrative with tactical strategy. As a mysterious Soul Controller, explore past souls in a universe where apocalypse meets fairy tales. Ready to unveil apocalyptic secrets and command souls? Embark and let rebirth begin!

name: Project: Nova
description: Project: NOVA is a VR Puzzle game centred around the feelings of astrophobia and isolation. As an engineer it's your duty to repair the ship. On your voyage you will be faced with puzzles and decisions which will determine the fate of everyone onboard. Will the passengers survive... will you?

name: Panthalassa
description: Panthalassa is a Point and click and visual novel set in an underwater alien world. You play as an AI trying to uncover the memories of their body's previous owner. The game makes you experience the world through different user interfaces, where the physical and digital worlds collide.

name: Synthroute 82
description: Solo infinite destruction racing game

name: Vale
description: Fight your way to dominion over the universe in this Shoot Em Up game based on the book! On the planet Vale, known for its extreme cold and endless snowfields, the story follows young Talen Esko and his sister Salla, whose family, the Esko clan, is transferred to govern this icy world.

name: Blind Jump
description: A brutally difficult platformer where all the platforms are invisible. Use your slime to unveil the platforms and carefully jump your way to the top.

name: Come Home: Ghost Stories from Bangladesh
description: Young Saif loved going for walks with his dad in the forests of Bangladesh. On one of these walks, however, they became separated and Saif was left alone. What he encountered that day would reveal secrets about his home that, sooner or later, would need to be confronted.

name: An Archers Fate
description: Explore the lands of Sophiza and defeat monsters with various arrow types and abilities. Traverse on treacherous platforms with your mobility skills. Go on an epic adventure about a young archer to put an ancient evil back in its cage.

name: Casino Rogue
description: Casino Rogue is a poker inspired roguelike card game in which you play with familiar playing cards and leverage special Chips and Stamps to gain points and reach for the highest level you can. What will your Casino Rogue Level be?

name: Styria
description: Humanity has become cattle for vampires. For trying to change this, you pay with the blood of your friends. ARPG Styria offers unique combat styles for each type of enemy and immerses you in an original world with steampunk vampires. Explore, kill, and choose your path!

name: Spine & Quill
description: Take up spine and quill in defense of your homeland of New Rodentia! Control the fight with a unique physics based combat system that spotlights the spear. Follow the story of Quillary and Itsy on their quest, battle robots, bugs, and more in this indie action game.

name: Paranormal Power
description: "paranormal power" is a 2D Chinese folk fantasy style adventure storyline game. Players take on the role of a Taoist disciple accidentally stumbles into a dangerous county. Players can fight against various demons and monsters, or make choices that affect the subsequent storyline

name: Universe Unknown
description: A third person, sci-fi, looter shooter. Reclaim earth from robotic enemies. Level up, gain skill abilities, and fight for the right of our very existence.

name: Separated
description: Separated is a 2-player horror co-op escape room experience. You and your friend were separated by a blind entity and your only hope of escape is to communicate to solve mind-boggling puzzles. But beware! The entity is always listening.

name: Veil: Tactics
description: VEIL: Tactics is a turn-based strategy game set in an alternative world of today. Lead your squad of humans and other fantastical characters through missions to save two worlds - ours, and the world of Fantasy.

name: The Shadows Within: Nightmare's Game
description: In this survival horror game, players guide Andrea after she receives a distressing call from her ex-girlfriend, setting off a chain of events resulting in her abduction. Stranded in the enigmatic Ebonvale, Andrea fights for survival against an unknown foe.

name: Aldora
description: You've left your home island for the vast continent of Arronia. Starting with nothing, gather resources, craft, and build your home, or explore new lands. Can you thrive and make a name for yourself in this world?

name: Playable Alpha
description: Surviving a post-catastrophic event, your mission is to survive. In this VR First Person Looter Shooter, you will get weapons, gear, upgrade it and have fun blasting them aliens to shreds.

name: AI Confidential
description: Artificial Intelligence, Real Problems: You are Makenzy Turner, an affable RoboTechnician employed by AI megacorp, Indelligent Solutions. With your trusty assistant ARI, use high-tech tools and old-fashioned empathy to mend everything from broken parts to broken hearts.

name: Rise of the Bugs
description: RISE OF THE BUGS is a 2D pixel art adventure game about annoying bugs. Lead a colony in search of new food, discover the secrets of mutation and escape from the angry men on the kitchen. Will you be able to steal the mysterious sauce or you die crushed under a slipper?

name: Emlis
description: Play as Emlis, a slime, explore an interconnected world, and fight enemies using elemental powers. Recover stolen elemental spirits from invaders to save the corrupted forest Soleen. Uncover secrets, defeat bosses, restore spirits to bring back life.

name: Keep Runnin
description: Keep Runnin is a 2D sidescrolling parkour-platformer game where you navigate through various, visually stunning environments, overcome obstacles, and evade unexpected hazards. Test your reflexes and embrace the excitement of a high-stakes chase in this exhilarating adventure.

name: Leguiumz Experience
description: The official game to interact with Leguiumz Twitch Channel. Come and play with the other viewers, in an endless battle for fame, and request priority on the stream ! Multiple game modes, to make the stream even crazier than before !

name: Apano Syn Fighter
description: Is there a gamepad lying around somewhere?!! Ready to play some real shooter games again? Grab the controller and become an APANO SYN PILOT to face the alien invasion. Connect up to four controllers and shoot until you drop. 100% survival chance on "Easy", low on "Impossible".

name: Mafia Simulator
description: Rise as a crime lord in "Mafia Simulator" : A simulation game blending action, strategy, and an open world. Conquer the city by managing illicit businesses like weed farms, weapons manufacturing and cocaine trading, and make decisions that could mean life or death.

name: Tales of the Tavern
description: Explore and protect Neverue in "Tales of the Tavern," a fantasy ARPG that mixes intense combat with cozy life-sim elements like cooking and farming. Play as Gwen, mastering culinary magic to enhance her abilities.

name: Turtle River RPG
description: Turtle River is a punishing, loot-based, JRPG dungeon crawler. Enter the deadly forest of Chedone to rescue the Arch-Phrenic and save Turtle River.

name: Pixel Quest: Lost Relics
description: Join Eva and Pobextil in their journey in this pixel platformer adventure!

name: The Final Keeper
description: You are the last surviving keeper, tasked with the recovery of the relics dropped by your fellow fallen keepers. Explore a fully destructible dark fantasy post apocalyptic world, as you fight your way towards redemption.

name: SkyNuggets
description: Click to fly and avoid Obstacles, increasing your score.

name: Port of Jumanah
description: 'Port of Jumanah’ is a retro pixel-style underwater adventure with rogue-lite elements. Meet quirky characters, explore unique places, and encounter unusual sea life. Treasures and troubles await in these seas! Are you ready to dive into the unknown? Lovely mermaids and menacing sharks await!

name: Reverb
description: Reverb is a multiplayer PVPVE extraction stealth shooter with a first-person perspective, set in a fictional Biopunk universe where there is a constant struggle for evolution.

name: Carbon
description: Carbon is Action RPG set in cyberpunk/biopunk world. Create your path to power through 18 uniquely themed specializations in the passive skill tree. Carbon is developed by a team of industry veterans and ARPG enthusiasts who have long felt that the sci-fi theme was underrepresented in this genre.

name: Happy Corner
description: The corner everyone dream for, fight for. Frustration, anger should not stop your step. Everything, just for the one moment.

name: Lost Lullabies: The Orphanage Chronicles
description: "Lost Lullabies - The Orphanage Chronicles" is a Co-Op horror game set in 1980, inspired by the real stories of an orphanage ruined by a fire in 1960 Lowell. Playable with 1-4 players, the goal is to identify and expel malevolent spirits alone or with your team.

name: Matreshka
description: Matreshka is a first-person psychological horror experience, you must navigate a maze of old soviet building by elevator. Searching for a way to escape.

name: Hell On Earth
description: Immerse yourself in a captivating world where demons have begun to invade the surface of Earth. Join a holy faction as you battle endless hordes of demons, purging them from your infested lands. Venture forth and unravel the mystery behind their overwhelming presence.

name: The Tortoise and the Hare
description: Explore a retelling of the classic Aesop Fairy Tale. A songbird, named Simon, narrates the tale, bringing the story alive one word at a time. The experience is fully animated and voiced with an easy to digest story mode and lots of bonuses and secrets to discover!

name: Nethack
description: Unravel cyber secrets and foil mass surveillance as a skilled hacker in NetHack. Challenge authority, rewrite the rules, and emerge as the ultimate digital rebel.

name: Exorcise
description: Exorcise is the first title of ( The Hell + Me ) game series. In this game you In an underground place occupied by demons you must try to survive and find your way by solving puzzles and destroying the demons. Are you ready for an exorcism?

name: Within the Vault
description: Within The Vault is an action packed isometric roguelite with a heavy influence from classic film noire. Featuring dynamic dialogue, energetic big band inspired tracks, a variety of ranged and melee weapons to choose from, and unlockable permanent upgrades for endless fun.

name: Yvy
description: An adventure autobattler game based on customizable dice rolls and rogue-lite elements, inspired by real events in 16th century Brazil. Build your own dice, strategically choosing each face, and defend the region of Pindó from the Whitecloak invaders!

name: Vampdoll: The Blood-Drinking Maidens
description: A visual novel game featuring a pure love girls' love story bound by blood, with the concept of "Vampires x Military Uniforms x girls' love (yuri) ."

name: Stop The F
description: "Stop The F" - a satire game on the endlessly unreleased remakes of one famous cancelled game, in the genre of puzzles created through the prism of many kinds of humor. The project is unique in its playability. In addition to the already known mechanics, there will be much more new ones in the game.

name: Trailblazers: Into the March
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure in this roguelite colony-sim strategy game. Command your Landship in tactical battles, care for a crew composed of all sorts of characters, shape your home, manage resources, and lead expeditions into the March. Discover what lies at its heart... and in yours.

name: Silks of Mind
description: Silks of Mind is a puzzle-platformer where you will use telekinetic powers to manipulate the environment. Guided by an ancestral spirit, a new guardian is summoned to the Sacred Lands, a mystical realm threatened by echoes of an ancient grudge.

name: Guardians of The AfterLife
description: Guardians of the Afterlife is an adventure to reclaim your existence, bridging the mystical divide between the afterlife and the physical world. Through strategic combat, puzzle-solving, and unraveling a rich narrative, uncover the secrets of your past and fight for a second chance at life.

name: Monster Souls
description: Monster Souls is a turn-based sidescroller RPG where you play as a newbie adventurer who gets wrapped up in a grand quest because of a special power that renders him irresistible to monsters. Bang your buddies, get dominated by monsters, and gain cool powers!

name: The Watcher's Curse
description: Search for ancient knowledge, face off against the supernatural, and solve the mysteries plaguing the land of Hollow Veil. The forces of chaos are rising and you may be the only living being that can stop them. Traverse the world, level up, and face down esoteric horrors.

name: Darkwatch
description: Created by a 4 man team this short FPS puts you in the shoes of a Darkwatch agent fighting against mysterious creatures. With your loyal canine by your side, upgrade weapons, buy perks and fight the forces of darkness!

name: SwapMeat
description: SWAPMEAT is a co-op third-person shooter where you raid the weirdest worlds and angriest aliens in the universe...for their meat. Swap meat with the enemies you defeat to steal their abilities and augment your hero on the fly, and fight alongside your friends to bring home the bacon.

name: Destiny 2: Legacy Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Island 2: Character Pack - Jungle Fantasy Ryan
description: Sin descripción

name: Bug Alliance
description: Bug Alliance is a pixel style top-down action RPG, where you play as bug warriors, each with unique abilities and weapons. Choose your Bug, select a game mode and dive into battles against worm tyranny. Fight, upgrade, farm resources, evolve and become a legend. Alliance is calling you!

name: Steve's Warehouse
description: Steve's warehouse is a melting pot of physics, rogue-like and deckbuiling. Purchase objects, play them all and don't make any falls!

name: Money Simulator
description: Become a mogul in this thrilling simulation game! Buy, sell, and customize cars, trade in cryptocurrencies, and expand your empire with your very own shop. Take risks, make deals, and watch your business flourish in this dynamic world.

name: Brok the Investigator: The Brawl Bar
description: All-action additional content for BROK the InvestiGator. Fight your way through new enemies, tackle crazy challenges, and make new friends!

name: Ranger Force
description: Ranger Force is an atmospheric third person, action, adventure, shooter, and fighting game that can be experienced alone, or with a partner in multiplayer split-screen mode.

name: Agents of Argus
description: "Agents of ARGUS" is an isometric midcore stealth game.

name: Chornobyl Liquidators - Supporter Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Puss in Woods
description: What will Jack do? Can he take care of his wife and also look after his farm and survive the winter?

name: The South Island
description: Welcome to The South Island! Step into the shoes of a young adventurer, explore the rich fauna and flora while collecting essential resources, learn about the indigenous culture, and face unique enemies and bosses of the region to rescue your family in this old-school RPG!

name: Kitesurf Runner
description: Become a kitesurfing hero in this 2D X-treme sports runner game.

name: Broken Shell
description: Broken Shell is a cute and cozy adventure game filled with love and courage. Join Mr. and Mrs. Hermit, an adorable couple, as they navigate through a charming world filled with puzzles, challenges, and heartwarming moments on their heartfelt journey to a better life.

name: Triad
description: Embark on an epic journey across the realm of Lyria in this real time fantasy RPG paying homage to classic games. Assemble your Triad from 15 unique classes, engage in strategic tab-targeting combat, and uncover ancient secrets in a world of danger and mystery.

name: Light Of Chaos
description: Sin descripción

name: Who Is The Killer: Episode IV
description: You have recently received an unexpected invitation. Frederick Adams, a psychiatrist whom you met several years ago, has invited you to observe a remarkable case of mental illness. Late at night, you arrived at the hospital near which your old friend lived. But in the morning, that particular female patient was found dead...

name: Circling
description:
Poem adapted from "The sun changed colors" by Margorie Agosín.

Created for bitsy jam #81 - tomatoes.

name: Undernauts: Labyrinth of Yomi & Mon-Yu
description: Undernauts: Labyrinth of Yomi & Mon-Yu Bundle

name: Offroad Jeep Driving
description: Sin descripción

name: The Moto Racer Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Call of Duty: Zombie Warfare
description: Sin descripción

name: Deckfort Alchemist
description: Strategic roguelike tower defense game where you fortify your defense line by stacking cards in deckforts, play various cards on enemies and deployable grids, and receive general contributions to your defense from altar structures.

name: LowLife Forms
description: An epic RPG shooter filled with alien and droid gangsters, space shamans and cosmic smuggling.

name: Pipsqueak!
description:
Explore a strange and hostile world in this search-action platformer starring a tiny mouse named Tofu.

Pipsqueak! is a search-action platformer starring Tofu, a small mouse exploring a strange and hostile world. Uncover the truth of this expansive world and your place within it through exploration, discovery, combat, and platforming challenges. Bring hope to this dying world and its tiny inhabitants in this grand adventure of mouse-sized proportions!

name: A Stop for the Night
description: Sin descripción

name: A New Life
description: Sin descripción

name: Big Top
description: This is a prototype of a children's educational game that was done by James WickStead Design Associates. It was archived from JWDA graphics designer Robin Ballweg. According to to her, the game was never fully developed.

name: Pokémon Donjon Mystère Online
description:
PDMO is a French free 2D MMORPG based on the Pokemon Mystery Dungeon series. Embark on a unique adventure as one of 20 different pokemon starters! Missions, harvesting, crafting, tumultuous dungeons, events, pokemons and, above all, fun!

Start your adventure now!

name: Maximum Apocalypse: The Video Game
description: Scavenge, battle, survive! Choose your survivor and face diverse apocalyptic scenarios in this cooperative digital adaptation of the hit board game Maximum Apocalypse. Grab your friends or make new ones with 1-6 player apocalyptic roguelike gameplay.

name: Eggsplosion
description: Sin descripción

name: Namco Super Heroes
description: Namco Super Heroes is a fan-made fighting game for Windows developed by hiro, released in 2007, with the latest version in 2016. Five classic Namco characters are playable; Bravoman (written as "Berabow Man"), Wonder Momo, Gil from The Tower of Druaga, Rick from Splatterhouse, and Valkyrie from Valkyrie no Bouken.

name: SpongeBob Run
description: A web browser game that has SpongeBob running through levels non-stop.

name: The Witches' Whisk
description:
Manage a magical bakery with your witches' whisk — which doubles as a wand!

Bake pastries, cakes, cookies, and more by casting spells and enchantments to complete orders for your hungry customers. In the Witches' Whisk, you'll play as a witch who owns a bakery. You'll be tasked with bakery management, challenging spell casting, recipe unlocking, decorating desserts and more.

In addition, you will be able to build and upgrade your bakery, including decorating the layout and earning new spells along the way to help you take your recipes even further! You'll be able to decorate your baked goods in fun ways that are unique to your style that you can re-use later. Speaking of style... you will be able to create and customize your own character in this magical journey.

name: Persist Online
description: Persist Online is an MMORPG with zombies, so you better get yourself a gun. Survive in an unforgiving open world, where every building is accessible. Forge a deadly team with friends and claim what's not yours. Take your loot to your safe bunker to craft better gear. Some survive. The best persist!

name: Maid With Perfection
description:
It's your lucky day! You won a special lottery! In the mail, you get the deed to a large estate in a place you've never heard of. You find yourself being driven there in a luxury car, feeling like a billion dollars.

As you arrive, you meet your maid, whom you get to name. She apparently the best Maid in the area and the fact that she chose you to be her master/mistress should honor you. The first day goes almost like a dream: your maid prepares amazing food, cleans the house, preps your bath, and even flirts with you a bit! Lucky you!

name: Innocence: A Seduce Me Story
description:
Before the demon war, there was a brilliant kingdom.
Within its walls lived a beautiful succubus princess.
She was a beacon of hope and peace to her people.
With such a heavy crown to bear, the princess found solace and affection in her childhood friend.
Does he truly love her in return?
--This is a prequel to the 2015 visual novel "Seduce Me the Otome"--

name: A Second Mario Bros. X Thing: Analog Funk
description: A Second Mario Bros. X Thing: Analog Funk is the sequel to A Super Mario Bros. X Thing: Prelude to the Stupid. Also developed by Talkhaus through the Super Mario Bros. X engine. Much like the first game, players can pick between 5 playable characters: Demo, Iris, Kood, Sheath and Raocow himself.

name: Quiiiz
description:
Quiiiz is a real time online trivia game platform that allows players to win cash prizes.
The game connects creators, community managers, and their fans in a thrilling festival of engagement and monetization.

name: Letter Bunny
description: Take on a cozy adventure as Anne, a small and determined bunny with a heart of gold. Explore the peaceful island, deliver many packages and discover that behind every letter is a unique story! Make new friends, help people out and most importantly, have fun!

name: Tarzan
description: A canceled port of Tarzan for ColecoVision.

name: Bloodrun
description: Completely redesigned Quake III Arena, it is already having 6 champions, following the same principle as in Quake Champions, it is planned to add more champions and add way more other champions. All mechanics and engine is Quake III Arena based, but the rest (maps, damage, weapons, champions) will be different.

name: Hive and Seek
description: Hive and Seek is a side-scrolling strategy base-building game where you clear randomly generated Roguelike stations infested with monsters. By rallying robots and clearing rooms, you will be able to destroy hives and recapture the station piece by piece.

name: Babies vs. Monsters
description: Babies Vs Monsters is a bullet hell rogue-like game with RPG elements. Designed with cartoonish animations, this game offers various characters, level designs, and challenging boss battles that are both fun and difficult!

name: Confined
description: Confined is a short horror-puzzle game where you have three minutes to solve a puzzle to escape a kidnapper’s grungy, dangerous basement.

name: Perfect Apocalypse: The Day After
description: Sin descripción

name: Purrfect Apawcalypse! Incredible Furture!
description: This is the PA series first Fan-game!

name: Touhou: Wandering Souls
description: Wandering Souls is a 2013 action role playing game developed by Estheone using RPG Maker VX. The player takes the role of three characters; Reimu, Marisa and Sakuya as they try to collect all wandering souls and travel to Edge of Heaven to find out who is responsible for the incident of Kekkai (barriers). The player starts with Reimu while Marisa and Sakuya will join later. Only one can fight while others act as supporting characters. Each character has a different special move, weapon and accessories; but have the same basic moves such as double jump, air dash and hyper mode. There are four barriers and each require different conditions to be unlocked. Sometimes enemies drop money and the player can use it to purchase items, weapons or accessories at Rinnosuke's shop. Wandering Souls also features hidden paths, an extra final boss and new game modes with higher difficulties which can be unlocked upon game completion.

name: It's Our Revolution
description:
It's Our Revolution! is a freeware "puzzle RPG" by Wood Penguin made in RPG Maker VX Ace.

The goal of the game is for the unheard youth to gather a following to sway the king. Unfortunately, as your ensemble grows, you'll find it becomes a little difficult to get around...

name: Coach Fight
description: Pick your coach and fight increasingly challenging opponents!

name: Backrooms: Between Lost Dimension
description: Backrooms: Between Lost Dimensions is a horror game that immerses you in the surreal world of the Backrooms. Trapped in an endless maze of monotonous rooms, you must solve disturbing puzzles and face sinister creatures to find an escape. Is your escape just an illusion?

name: Maskerade: The Deadpan Cry
description: Maskerade is a first person narrative oriented Survival Horror game, where you incarnate a young girl who has been kidnapped and forced to work as a ballerina in a terrific and mysterious cabaret, from which she must find a way to escape from the clutches of the Madame who runs it.

name: Splatter World
description: A cancelled RPG based on the Splatterhouse franchise.

name: Carnaval
description: Game by Eric Chahi

name: Doggy
description: White Doggy is running on the linear forest road to reach his kennel. The screen scrolls from left to right to simulate this event seen from a third-person perspective. The road is full of different obstacles, and it is the player's task to avoid them. The obstacles vary from traps, barriers, logs, pits, etc. to a truck scattering the debris or a wolf running in the opposite direction. Doggy may be controlled to jump and move on the road up and down. The dog's energy is gradually exhausting while it is running. Bones scattered on the road may be collected to refill the dog's energy. If the energy is vanished or with each obstacle struck, the dog loses a life. There are five dog lives at the start. The best scores are stored in a high score table.

name: Paper Mario Randomizer
description: A randomizer for Paper Mario on the Nintendo 64. Generate your own seed and discover the game in a fresh new way!

name: Swingmania
description: Swingmania is a Virtual Reality rhythm game where you slice the notes!

name: Ruby's Vitten Party
description:
A horror video-game featuring VTuber RubyWhiska's Birthday Party.

What begins as a seemingly pleasant visit to her house quickly descends into chaos, as guests must fight to survive the night or face being transformed into Vittens.

name: Terezi Pyrope: Ace Attorney
description: Tavros is accused of Murder by an old FLARPing buddy in a Court-Only Tutorial case.

name: Heaven Over It
description: The theme is to go up, and your mission is to get to heaven. It's a vertical scroll platformer, indie and single player action game. It is controlled using only the mouse and can be completed in a few minutes.

name: Narcis Crosswords
description: Narcis Crosswords is a crossword game that is bundled in with the Persian software Narcis Dictionary. The game is made to help English learners understand the language better using crossword puzzles.

name: Work Beasts
description: Manage your workforce of mystical work beasts! Increase your team productivity in order to complete the most difficult jobs and earn lots of money, after all, the government won't leave you alone if you don't pay your taxes. Oh, don't forget to give your employers a coffee sometimes.

name: Wonder Wand
description: Embark on a spellbinding adventure in a strange land that’s brimming with puzzling dungeons, bouncing slimes & zany encounters in WONDER WAND, a 2D puzzle game about a confused fox with a magical wand.

name: Wizwag
description: Explore a charming, mysterious world in a classic, top-down action adventure! Investigate monster-infested dungeons, collect items to unlock new moves, and solve puzzles to uncover the truth, with help from some unusual friends.

name: Wizard Tournament
description: In this party combat game, up to 4 players battle it out. Assert your supremacy as the last survivor and claim victory! Traps, alliances, betrayals - anything goes to survive in the arena.

name: Witching Well
description: Welcome to 'Witching Well,' a magical world where creativity thrives. Master unusual and powerful magic and use it to shape the world around you. Build, decorate and create vibrant villages filled with unique characters. Grant wishes, make friends, and have fun. Your journey begins!

name: Zlin City: Arch Moderna
description: Zlín City: Arch Moderna is a unique, visually stunning, and relaxing city-building game set in the 1930s and 1940s, inspired by actual historical events and the functionalist architecture of Zlín.

name: Titleless Tale
description: An auto-battle RPG. Gather randomly generated rare equipment and companions to train your party and take on formidable foes.

name: SkyLeague
description: Enjoy and master your sky car. Participate in soccer matches, races and other mini-games. Explore the world to meet other players and cooperate with them during matches. Grind ranked ladders to become the greatest champion of Sky League.

name: Rheinland
description: Let yourself be carried away by Wanderslust and travel down the medieval River Rhine with the musicians. Experience a cozy, narrative-heavy fantasy story. Gather harmony and manage your resources. The key to everything is music, so improvise your own songs since in Rheinland everyone is a musician!

name: Purge Party
description: See what's coming ahead and select your targets with the FEARBOARD battle system, a fresh take on turn-based combat. Explore a nightmarish world full of secrets, and make unlikely friends and enemies along the way.

name: Fluff's Adventure: A Tale of Fur and Steel
description: Fluff's Adventure: A Tale of Fur and Steel is a 3D third-person puzzle game with platforming elements. The game is focusing on non-textual storytelling, exploration and puzzles centered around fluffy furballs called "Fluffs". It creates a wholesome atmosphere in a stylized and colorful environment.

name: Poolrooms
description: Welcome to Level 37, commonly known as the Poolrooms, a psychological horror experience that immerses players in an eerie, otherworldly environment.

name: Red's Kingdom & Storm in a Teacup
description: Red’s Kingdom & Storm in a Teacup Bundle

name: Pups & Purrs Animal Hospital and Fun! Fun! Animal Park
description: Pups & Purrs Animal Hospital and Fun! Fun! Animal Park Bundle

name: Grasp of Dread
description: Grasp Of Dread is an asymmetrical multiplayer horror game where one player takes on the role of a monster from another world and tries to escape, while the other four players are monster hunters who seek to deal with the undead as soon as possible.

name: The Die Is Cast
description: The Die is Cast. Now, all you need to do is trust your companions and penetrate the enemy's weaknesses.

name: Past the Moon; Towards the Sun
description: Past the Moon; Towards the Sun is a fantasy visual novel that invites you into a richly woven tale of self-discovery and empowerment. Step into the shoes of Colleen, a young girl filled with apprehension about her future, whose dreams and aspirations seem out of reach.

name: Beer Runner
description: Jump, run, and climb over obstacles to deliver the keg of beer. Solve easy puzzles to progress further in the cyberpunk city. In each level, you'll discover new abilities like double jump, teleportation, etc. You can collect beer cans that will unlock additional content.

name: Jumpers' Mountain
description: Join our little friends on this adventure, jumping between platforms to uncover the paths of 'Jumper's Mountain'. However, beware, as there are many secrets to reach the top, and a miscalculated jump can be quite costly.

name: Honeydew
description: Discover your destiny in Honeydew, an enchanting adult visual novel of self-discovery and romance, unraveling the secrets of a diverse and captivating world. With lush art, branching narrative, full narration, and a player-driven story, embark on an adventure where every choice defines your path.

name: Sombionic
description: Shoot monsters and romance them during combat! In Sombionic you play as a female scientist fighting monsters and genetically engineered humans, harvesting their rare genes and organs for your own inventory.

name: I Hate My Waifu Streamer
description: Draw the attention of the streamer at any cost, before someone else does it. Write comments, chat, make donations to your waifu, but do not dare to hate her!

name: NightSong
description: Tycho's Apocalypse. The game depicts a pilgrimage to Victory, the Capitol City of Lights.

name: Reclaim Earth
description: Reclaim Earth is a base-building, colony management, survival game where you play as a semi benevolent robot crash-landed on a post apocalyptic Earth. You must build your base, enlist the help of humans, and defend against hordes of mutated bugs.

name: Boundless Lust
description: Introducing "Boundless Lust" – the captivating visual novel game created by Farix. In "Boundless Lust," players make choices that shape the storyline, leading to different outcomes. Dive into a rich, story-driven experience.

name: RnGesus Slayer
description: RnGesus Slayer is an exhilarating roguelike deckbuilder where your cards come from a slot-machine! Customize your slot-decks, twist fate to your advantage, and together with your wife, challenge RnGesus in your epic quest to become the ultimate Demon King.

name: Necromancer For A Week
description: Reanimate monsters, choose their ideal moveset and form the perfect 3-monster-team to dominate the competition in this turn-based strategy roguelike. Use action points each turn on brutal combos and strategic positioning to be crowned champion of the annual Necromancer Tournament!

name: Exohub
description: You will find yourself on the edge of space, on one of the space stations. A place where travelers, research scientists, traders and adventurers from all corners of the galaxy gather. But is everything so safe?

name: Starduster
description: STARDUSTER is a musical and arcade game wrapped in an abstract aesthetic with neon lights designed for players who enjoy difficult challenges and seek to push their own limits.

name: Re:Agent
description: Take on the role of Agent 314, a spy with a secret mission in the rival nation of Ophidia. Explore a dystopian society, confront ethical dilemmas, and tackle tactical challenges. Can you uncover the hidden truth behind the facade and complete your mission before it's too late?

name: Nightmare in the Old Mansion
description: "Nightmare in the Old Mansion" is a first-person indie horror game where John, a real estate agent, receives a call to evaluate an old mansion and will have to fight for his life.

name: Rubedo: The Occult Dawn
description: Open-world RPG with turn-based combat. As the Last Alchemist, tasked to unleash forbidden chaos magic into the world, perform occult rituals, master ancient spells, and awaken spirits—vile or merciful. Evade the realm's harsh anti-witchcraft edicts and restore the tradition of mystery and magic.

name: A Very Dark Ride in the Proximity of the House of Mirrors
description: A vewy scawy horror, adventure PCVR game played through the eyes of Eve, a little girl with a big imagination. Run, hide, swim and scream your way into her horrible nightmares while navigating through surreal worlds and creatures. Puzzles, stealth, games and fame await you. Try not to wake up!

name: Azaran: Islands of the Jinn
description: An N64-style adventure inspired by Arabian Nights. Explore dungeons, solve puzzles, collect awesome treasures, and unlock the mystery of the Jinn.

name: Auto Clicker Pro
description: Auto Clicker Pro, easy setup and operation, customizable X-Y positions, adjustable click intervals, fast performance without freezing or lag, ideal for gaming and personal use, achieving up to 130 clicks per second with a record

name: Atlas Online
description: Welcome to Atlas Online, the 2D MMORPG pirate game! In this exciting pirate adventure, fight for your own glory, conquer islands with your alliance, embark on new adventures, and rule the seas!

name: A Tale of Sand and Bone
description: A Tale of sand and Bone is a story-rich action-roguelike adventure. You play as Shai, a fallen warrior bound to a vengeful spirit as you climb and fight your way to claiming vengeance against the gods.

name: Asili Forest
description: Asili Forest: Guide V12 on a heroic quest to save humanity in this visually stunning 2D platformer adventure, Embark on an epic journey with V12 in Asili Forest, where nature and technology collide in a captivating tale of bravery and discovery.

name: Asbak
description: Asbak is a hack n' slash action roguelike platformer. Exorcise the demons lurking in urban Indonesia. BE FEARLESS!

name: A Little Space
description: A casual, 2D space game about taking some time for yourself while paving humanity's way to a new world. Fly your way through a variety of bite-sized levels: dodge asteroids, power up satellites and even play football (soccer) in space!

name: The Rule of She
description: A soul about to be reborn mistakenly enters a world of strange tales filled with rules. Beware! This place is fraught with danger, and to successfully complete the rebirth, you must follow the rules of this world. The world will correct any soul that violates the rules. Will you comply or defy?

name: A Sunday Afternoon
description: Help the insecure Lucas, and his sassy best friend Carol, explore a watercolored São Paulo and solve puzzles to complete a sticker album to gift his secret crush, Leo, in this cute-as-heck visual novel!

name: Story of Seasons: Untitled 2024
description: A new title for the Story of Seasons series to be released in 2024.

name: Bikkuriman Wonder Collection
description: A new mobile game in the Bikkuriman series!

name: Equiverse
description: Experience the ultimate ecosystem simulator! Equiverse is a cozy simulation game where you care for different species of animals, earn income by keeping them happy, unlock helpful companions, and defend against invading monsters. Can you keep your ecosystem thriving?

name: Sausage Legend: Arena
description: Sausage Legend is a 3D physics-based fighting game where players clash their sausages in battle. You take on the role of a medieval slave, forced to fight in the "Sausage Duel," a pastime of the nobility. To gain your freedom, you must emerge victorious in this mad contest.

name: Memories of Bust
description: Dive into a thrilling roguelike deckbuilder where strategy meets chance! Use your own deck to beat your foes in a Blackjack-inspired combat system. Push your luck in a procedurally generated dungeon where every draw could be your last. Will you gamble your way to victory or fold under pressure?

name: Rewilder
description: Rewilder branches out from Match 3 conventions with a blend of strategic puzzle solving, and a zen-like meditative ambiance. Help Naia, the island's defender, harness nature's strength by tracing paths though matching flora and create Essence Links, which you'll use to cleanse contaminated habitats, and turn frenzied creatures into cute allies. You'll adapt to game-changing hazards and discover new creatures to re-populate the restored habitats!

name: Jack Mason: Ace Attorney
description: We play as Jack Mason, an old friend of Phoenix Wright that traveled to his country to finally meet him, after a long time and finishing his law studies. He was told to rendezvous in an unusual place: a courtroom lobby? And, apparently, there's also a trial today? What? A certain Larry Butz was arrested for car theft and murder!? But he doesn't even own a license!

name: Myles Wright: Ace Attorney
description: 23 years after the events of Spirit of Justice, a new defense attorney steps up to the plate. Myles Wright, the son of Phoenix Wright, has finally achieved his dream of continuing his father's legacy. With his attorney badge proudly pinned on his lapel, he jumps on the first cases he can get. Unfortunately, his eagerness comes back to haunt him as he's thrown into a series of events that turn his world inside-out. With a serial killer hot on his trail, can Myles live up to his father's namesake? Or will he fall, just like Phoenix Wright did 8 years ago?

name: Ace Attorney Online: The Game
description: A Pywright game that replicates the Ace Attorney Online experience.

name: ShowMeSpeed
description: 2D Single / Multiplayer speedrunning / racing platformer, enriched with items and timer.

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Tails Abuse In Court
description: An Ace Attorney fan game based on Whoisthisgit's Tails Abuse In Court videos

name: Abysus Arena
description: Abysus Arena is a Cartoon Network online game. It uses the Unity Web Player.

name: Retrieval
description: Retrieval is a cinematic horror and action-adventure game. The plot follows the experiences of Hana Loshe, a commander of a research team on a planet 18.6 billion miles away from Earth. Hana Loshe will fall by accident in a subway base where she will discover all the horrors that the base hides.

name: College Basketball Manager
description: Take charge as head coach in College Basketball Manager. Recruit your dream team, whether that be through All-Americans or hidden gems. Strategize gameplay, schedule games, run practices, and manage your staff, because you are in control. The court is your canvas – create a powerhouse.

name: Chronicles of Fear: The Babysitter's Tale
description: Psychological horror game without any jumpscares. Take care of Samuel, the neighbour’s kid, in this realistic singleplayer walking simulator and uncover family secrets.

name: Chooing
description: The electrifying fusion of Snake and tank battle! Engage in blistering battles as you obliterate your foes with a barrage of firepower or outmaneuver them with foxy tactics.

name: Chip & Sparky
description: Embark on a high-octane adventure with a young robot named Chip, as he teams up with his trusty companion Sparky to track down corporate pirates who have stolen his uncle's latest invention. Blast through action-packed levels, master high-tech gadgets, and overcome thrilling obstacles!

name: Chiccoo and Life
description: In the hills by the river is a small village of handful souls. Chiccoo the raccoon walks through them and their past lives discovering their joys and sorrows. Spend your time in an idyllic rustic environment unlocking the villagers' memories and solving environmental puzzles.

name: Catwave95
description: Catwave95 is a music puzzle game set in retro-futuristic cyberspace

name: Catffee Time!
description: By night, you're a stealthy rescuer saving stray cats in the suburbs; by day, a cat café owner, decorating, stocking up, and serving food. Dispatch unique cats to boost your rating and breed special breeds for competitions. Ready to make your café globally known?

name: Cat & Butterfly
description: Cat & Butterfly is a side-scrolling runner with pixel graphics and roguelike mechanics. The Cat is lost in its thoughts when a Butterfly flies by. The cute feline cannot help but chase the colorful insect and gets carried away in pursuit.

name: Cats War
description: Cat war where you kill the other cat to win, kill the cats and earn points.

name: Calangos e Coxinhas
description: Manage your stocks, organize your resources, cook snacks and make friendships.

name: Calamity
description: Survive disasters in Calamity! Explore a chaotic city, dodge deadly disasters, and escape before time’s up. Fast, frantic, and fun—can you stay alive during apocalyptic disasters?

name: Byte Survivor
description: Enter the world of gaming and earn! Earn a living through a game that mines cryptocurrency, acquire new PCs and avatars, and obtain better rewards. It is a top-down, roguelike action game.

name: Beyond Reason
description: Beyond reason is a knowledge-based time-loop game about surviving a tiny open world. Master fluid first person combat, while uncovering the island's secrets. When you die, you take nothing but your knowledge of the world into the next loop.

name: Beyond Tenmei
description: Roll dice, then cheat the dice with magic! Foil foes and trigger powerful talent synergies in this simple-but-deep twist on the turn-based RPG.

name: Really Simple Golf
description: Really Simple Golf is a climbing platformer golf, that blends chill vibes with precision driven adventure. Embark on an adventure across vibrant courses, mastering tricky shoots, navigating obstacles, and sinking those perfect putts.

name: Overall The Ball
description: Overall The Ball is a party game played locally, or online, from 2 to 4 players. Bounce a giant ball and eat your friends , play as colorful characters, use your abilities to take advantage and score points! Become the master of the arena!

name: Gnomes 'n Giants
description: Run from towering Giants. Flee from vicious predators. Scavenge what yee can from the mana-blessed overworld and scurry back to yone burrow. For yee are a Gnome, the lowest of the low…but maybe one day…with the Gnome King crowned, yee will return as conquers.

name: Up! The Floor Is Lava
description: Escape from the Lava, eliminate your opponents with Kicks and Punches. Be the one who reaches the highest in each round and show who is the Best.

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Deadswitch 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Occult
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Egypt
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Variety Pack 8
description: Sin descripción

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzles: Reflections. Part 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzles: Mandalas Part 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzles: Good Old Christmas
description: Sin descripción

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzles: Fantasy
description: Sin descripción

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzles: Cats
description: Sin descripción

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzles: Ukraine
description: Sin descripción

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzles: Christmas 2021
description: Sin descripción

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzles: Butterflies
description: Sin descripción

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzles: Winter Tale
description: Sin descripción

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzles: Impossibles #1
description: Sin descripción

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzles: Still Life #1
description: Sin descripción

name: Arkham Hotel 77
description: You are trapped in an endless lovecraftian hotel. Observe your surroundings and avoid eldritch anomalies in order to reach the exit.

name: Arkhe
description: Arkhe invites you into a visual novel adventure. Join the stoic warrior Derg and the passionate sorceress Agatha on their first joint mission. Step into the roles of both characters, unraveling mysteries and experiencing the story from dual perspectives.

name: Arkwhale
description: Arkwhale is a new submarine casual simulator. As the captain of a submarine, you will devise tactics, navigate your vessel, and carry out dangerous missions to annihilate enemies. Experience powerful weapons and advanced underwater technology!

name: Arising
description: First person space combat and exploration in an open world in a variety of star systems. Pilot ships, fight, run missions and trade.

name: Ares Breathes
description: Ares Breathes is a classic survival horror game in which you explore a recently destroyed Martian colony, given shape as a late 90s style low poly game complete with tank controls and static cameras.

name: Arenion
description: Explore a giant interconnected world riddled with monsters and machines. Ensnared by the convoluted web spun by a dangerous criminal syndicate hailing from a distant land, you uncover a horrifying secret. Will you yield to their manipulation or rise up to fight for what’s right?

name: Stick Robot Puzzle
description: A puzzle game that combines "Slide Puzzle" (you cannot stop until you hit a wall.) and "Sokoban" .

name: Roll: A Puzzle Contraption
description: Roll is a creative puzzle game where you build contraptions out of stickers to roll, fling, and guide a hamster to its goal. Collect stickers as you complete puzzles, then build your own wacky contraptions for Hammy.

name: Mama's Quesadillaria
description: Make quesadilla's in this VR cooking simulator inspired by the Papa's cooking games made by FlipLine Studio

name: Making Friends
description: Guide the misanthropic witch Morrigan as she creates a homemade friend of her very own in this short and sweet sapphic visual novel!

name: Malvinas: La Ultima Carta
description: The last survivor of a battalion (a teenage soldier) must protect the last letter of his fallen comrades. Undergo the hunger, cold and violence the Argentinean soldiers had to endure during the war on the islands.

name: Manludo 2
description: EN: Awake on an alien space-station, shape your journey through decisions, crafting your own interstellar adventure. EO: Vekiĝu en ekstertera kosmostacio, formu vian vojaĝon per decidoj, kaj vivu vian propran interstelan aventuron.

name: Love Sucks: Night Three
description: This is Love Sucks:Night Three, the third and final part in your mission to get laid and not die doing it. When sexy monsters are out to kill you for their own mysterious goals, it's date or die! So far you've manged to both live and die through two nights, but will you get out alive?

name: Lover Survivors
description: Two lovers join forces to save the universe through their bond and unique powers, revitalizing the cosmos.

name: Love Quest: Los Angeles
description: Connect with intriguing characters through thoughtfully chosen questions in Love Quest: LA. To win a girl's heart, you'll need to ask all questions correctly and eventually invite her on a second date. Can you unravel her desires and emotions to make her your girlfriend by the end of the game?

name: Love Hell
description: Love Hell is a cross between a Visual Novel and a Bullet Hell where you have to battle your emotions in order to get with the boy of your dreams! Participate in school activities, defeat your rival, and even play...rock, paper, scissors? Embark on an action-packed journey for romance!

name: Light Bearers 2
description: Light Bearers 2 is a fast paced hide and seek, asymmetrical multiplayer horror game. A Shadow is trying to corrupt all Light Bears. The Light Bears must use their movement and cunning. To keep each other from becoming corrupted by darkness.

name: Leo: The Square
description: Leo: The Square is a minimalist 2D platformer where players guide Leo, a square character, through various levels filled with puzzles and challenges. Explore unique environments, solve puzzles, and uncover the secrets of Leo's journey in this atmospheric adventure.

name: Kun’tewiktuk: A Mi’kmaw Adventure
description: Kun’tewiktuk: A Mi’kmaw Adventure is a fantasy adventure game inspired by Mi’kmaw legend and folklore. It chronicles the adventures of siblings Wasuek ("Flower") and her brother U'n ("Fog"). They get separated one summer morning and they go on an adventure through the spirit world to reunite.

name: Kost
description: KOST is an action adventure RPG game. In the near future, the intelligent system "KOST" will gradually dominate the world. Human consciousness can be transferred to machine generated human chips, and robots can be operated to achieve rebirth. In cruel world, the dark struggle will eventually erupt.

name: Koitsugi: Legend of the Water Guardian
description: Play as Kaida, a koi who is reluctantly thrown in to save, not just her pond, but the entire river from a poison that turns the habitants into raged filled monsters. In this story driven action-adventure you will slug it out with some of these river dwellers, friend and foe, to save your home!

name: Knight Lolita
description: An extremely lethal combat system with manual sword control emphasizes the decision to avoid enemies or slaughter even bosses in an instant in wide levels full of roaming monsters. The finished game will feature flight and more vertical exploration.

name: Kitty Collapse
description: Kitty Collapse offers an explosive first-person experience. Armed with diverse weapons, players demolish towering structures filled with mischievous cats. Each level brings unique challenges, with maps ranging from bustling cityscapes to tranquil countryside settings

name: Rock Band 3: Deluxe
description:
Rock Band 3 Deluxe is a mod for Rock Band 3 with the intention to improve and expands upon Rock Band 3 in every way possible.

With custom track themes, a higher song limit, an FC indicator, break countdowns, an expanded HUD, up to 60FPS venues, "padtar", fully customizable gameplay, many pro chart upgrades, and so much more.

name: Keaton's Adventure
description: Traverse the newly formed Milkdromeda Galaxy to restore balance and stomp out the Ultralite invasion!

name: Kaiju Fury Turbo
description: Kaiju Fury Turbo is a top-down, couch co-op, non-stop, action adventure. As a kaiju, battle your way from under military control, destroy defense hardened cities, defeat captured kaiju, and become the cataclysm they always feared.

name: Kalasta
description: Kalasta is a roguelite deckbuilder fish game with real time strategy mechanics. Play cards to spawn fish, feed them and defend your fish from waves of monsters!

name: Kana
description: Start your Japanese learning journey by learning the fundamentals! In Kana, you get to practice Hiragana and Katakana, which are two of the writing systems in Japanese.

name: Karjala
description: VHS bodycam horror in the atmosphere of Soviet Backrooms. Karelia is a country of rivers, forests and lakes, where the modern world comes in contact with superstitions and ancient rituals. Soldier Solnyshkov agrees to take part in a strange experiment of his command.

name: Kadin the Soul Eater
description: A Story driven game, where choices can branch. Pretend to be a mortal with so called friends.

name: Journey of Harvest
description: Welcome to Hope Town! You will be given an abandoned land where you can collect resources, assemble production lines, upgrade equipment, start adventures, harvest rewards, etc. I believe that in the near future, you will be able to unlock the secrets of the mine and enjoy this harvest journey.

name: Jordi & Oslo: The Lost Tail
description: Cute 2D Point-n-Click of the adorable comic book characters Jordi and Oslo the dragon.

name: Inkression
description: Enter the world of Milly Sommerville, a troubled tattoo artist tasked with capturing the remnants of her nearly-demolished neighborhood through her art. Walk the streets of her dark world, reconcile with her own past, and redefine the meanings of impressions in this first person narrative game.

name: Infernal Hunt
description: Forge your path through the fiery realms of Infernal Hunt, a captivating roguelike action game. Prepare for an epic adventure where you'll confront hordes of otherworldly creatures and navigate treacherous landscapes. Are you ready to become a true hunter of the damned?

name: Impostor Online
description: Inspired by the party games Werewolf and Mafia, Impostor Online is 6-18 online game of murder, mystery and deception. Sit with friends, play a civilian, an impostor, a butcher, a zombie or another type of character and use strategy to win!

name: Impawlse
description: Take care of your kittens, decorate their space, play with them.... It's all about kittens! The ultimate cat experience awaits you!

name: Horror: Evil Residents
description: Horror: Evil Residents is a thrilling 4-player co-op horror adventure, where you step into the shoes of a brave exorcist, venturing into a mysterious mansion plagued paranormal forces. Armed with seven sacred artifacts, you'll delve deep into their powers to unveil the demons' true names.

name: Honcho
description: Take on the Keiretsu and reclaim your grandfather's rightful spot amongst Japan's financial elite. Use your bespoke kei truck to deliver packages, purchase real estate and expand your company to show them you're more than just another Sukeban.

name: Hunter's Requiem
description: Hunter’s Requiem is a rogue-lite horror game. Coming from a long lineage of monster hunters, you must protect your town from the creatures surrounding it. Through crafting and exploration, you will discover the town's history and find a way to solve its monster problem once and for all.

name: Humanolve: A Human Evolution Card Saga
description: Embark on a primal card-based survival odyssey in Humanolve. Lead your tribe through perilous hunts, weather the wrath of nature, and forge tools of triumph. Combine cards to craft tools and weapons, explore the wilderness, and conquer your nemesis. Your choices will shape human evolution itself.

name: Hunter Chronicles: Tara and Vyn
description: A charming, action-packed RPG inspired by handheld gaming classics! Platform your way through many colorful locations, and beat up baddies in a challenging, familiar mix of turn-based combat and skill-based timed hits, with a rockin' soundtrack, crisp pixel graphics and an emotional story.

name: Hunt the Pale Gods
description: A cosmic horror grid based roguelike deck builder. Fight nightmarish creatures, add cards to your deck, discover powerful curios and combine all their unique effects in game breaking synergies. Awaken and Hunt the Pale Gods.

name: Hyper Skater
description: Hyper Skater is a 2d Skate Platformer in a retro asthethic world.

name: Hypogea
description: Escape from a mysterious underground megastructure in this short atmospheric 3d-platformer.

name: Finder
description: Finder receives an invitation to the Cradle from the lords of that ancient city. Use the map and unravel all the secrets of the mysterious labyrinthine, haunted city to find the only true path to the Philosophers Tower!

name: Equire
description: Dive into this immersive equestrian simulation and experience realistic horseback riding. Build your dream ranch and establish deep bonds with your horses. You are the boss! Manage staff and guests, or focus on challenging competitions. Breed, trade and raise foals as you choose your own destiny.

name: EOL: End Of Line
description: A sci-fi turn-based strategy game, no gimmicky mechanics just pure 4x glory.

name: Emitime
description: A Grid-based deck builder RPG where music and beat are your strategies. Expand your deck as you capture the enemies you encounter along the way, and solve puzzles by switching between the two protagonists from the past and future as you explore the world.

name: Enoah's Quest
description: Enoah's Quest is a top-down adventure RPG, featuring captivating narrative, stunning three-dimensional visuals, and electrifying gameplay, providing a memorable adventure and action experience.

name: Echoes of the Woods
description: Echoes of the Woods sets you into a terifying scenario where two kidnaped children must join forces to escape. As a 7-year-old, there's no fighting back, you can only hide and run... from the bogeyman.

name: Echo Flesh Metal
description: Echo Flesh Metal is a turn-based role-playing roguelike game in a military-fantastic world, where further events and the plot depend on your every decision. You need to help the recruit complete several objectives in the anomalous zone, but is everything that simple?

name: Echo of Mobius
description: Echo of Mobius is an innovative AI-driven role-playing game that incorporates CRPG-style adventures, simulation, and character-training gameplay. Players can create unique characters and their growth paths, or write and share adventure stories.

name: Echo of Prypiat
description: "Echo of Prypiat" is an exciting walking simulator that immerses the player in the atmosphere of the Chernobyl exclusion zone, conveying all the horrors and fears of people left in this forgotten land. The game is created to allow the player to feel the soul of this mysterious place.

name: E-commerce Simulator
description: Build your own digital retail empire and serve customers from around the globe! E-commerce Simulator offers you a comprehensive virtual trading experience where you can showcase and sell various products.

name: Eden Warrior
description: Embark on a journey to claim back what was yours. Battle legendary warriors of the past in simple but challenging setup. Free them from the entity that has corrupted them. Find out who you are!

name: Easy RTS
description: a minimalist rts game where decision-making is at the heart of simple and intuitive gameplay. Compete or cooperate with your friends online to build the best base.

name: Echo: Defy Death
description: A Roguelite RPG about betrayal, revenge, and how much you’re willing to pay to get it. Use echolocation to fight your enemies, make pacts with demons to grow stronger, gather weapons, find the one who stole your eyes and make them pay!

name: Dungeon & Doggies
description: Your human's missing & you're unleashed into a wild world! Explore the wilds, fight with cunning cardplay, and build the purrfect deck to conquer foes in this heartwarming adventure. Find your way home & prove you're more than just a pampered pet - you're a hero!

name: Dunderbeck
description: Build a gourmet sausage brand as a young, hungry entrepreneur (with a side hustle exterminating goblins.)

name: DrainSim
description: Dive into DrainSim and seize control of the floods! Clear the city's submerged streets, with a huge range of different tools from rakes to submersible pumps. Embrace the satisfaction of restoring the water flow. Become the city's hero, one drain at a time.

name: Do You Remember?
description: An exploration indie horror game with a deep story based on nostalgia and forgetting. you play as someone who cant remember anything, and finds themself in a strange, yet... familiar place. they're just trying to find out what's happening, who they are, and what this all has to do with them, but...

name: Shaolin Bao
description: Beat and batter your friends in this chaotic party arena game. Sauce up your attacks with spicy power ups as you team up or dish it out solo in fast-paced rounds across interactive Chinese-inspired arenas.

name: DinD
description: Will the Earth be better off when it loses humans？ 'DinD' is a 3rd person action-adventure,Walking in a world where mankind has disappeared, but not in peace。 Explore worlds that are no longer familiar, slay all sorts of monstrous creatures, and find out the answers to the world。

name: Desk Deck Heroes
description: Dip your pen in the company ink with this roguelite card-based adventure game! Find heroes, assemble a powerful party, and get ready to fill your weekdays with battles and quests!

name: Den of the Defiant
description: Den of the Defiant is a story-rich adult Visual Novel about a demon who is accidentally summoned by a coven of adorable witches. Navigate the strange world of the humans, forge bonds with your witches, and together face the coming storm.

name: Demon Kingdom
description: Demon Kingdom is a strategy card game with elements of a interactive novel. Rule the kingdom, solve mysteries, build relationships, and defeat your enemies.

name: Demon Crush
description: Demon Crush is a fast-paced 2D side-scrolling combat-platformer that blends expressive, combo-based fighting mechanics with the charming visuals and intuitive controls of a bygone era. Play as multiple characters, master different weapons and combat styles, and plunge into adrenaline-soaked action in a fantasy Japanese setting. Wall jumps, air combos, grappling hook traversal, super moves, chaotic battles, death-defying leaps, and razor-sharp duels to the death against inhuman, villainous bosses all await you!

name: Deliver Us Home
description: Deliver Us Home is a solitary sci-fi experience where one astronaut works to secure a new home and future for humanity.

name: Dead Scrap
description: Stranded in the decaying space colony of the Reach after a catastrophic event known as necroevolution wipes out most of the population, you must navigate a dystopian nightmare. Craft, build, and fight to survive in this ruthless survival horror simulator.

name: Deathland Drifters
description: Pilot a hovership across a doomed alien planet in this co-op roguelike FPS for 1-6 players. Master each hovership's unique playstyles, scavenge loot to create different builds, and work together with your crew of Drifters to fight your way off world.

name: Death Protocol
description: The voices in your head keep repeating numbers. You know only one way to make them stop...

name: Dead On Arrival
description: Dead On Arrival is a horror game set on trains. In the heart of an eternal night, a seemingly endless train barrels through a desolate, otherworldly landscape. Each carriage unfolds as a unique nightmare.

name: Dark Memories: Investigation
description: An immersive first-person psychological horror set in a desolate, oppressive, and mysterious police building. Unravel cursed events while searching for your missing coworker.

name: Dark & Quispy
description: A Fantasy Rouge-Like game with Paper thin graphics. Cut through waves of enemies and collect their souls to increase your power! Encounter a variety of enemies and events as you make your way through the DARK.

name: Dark Era
description: "Dark Era" invites you to an alternate timeline of the universe's demise, where "humanity's" desperate survival hinges on controlling black holes. Guide a space colony, manage resources, and advance tech. Explore space's mysteries while uncovering its secrets in an educational journal.

name: Darkfall
description: Darkfall is a Survival-RPG where you must overcome a death loop to escape a dangerous island before your body withers like the others. Be resourceful by using strategy and stealth to develop survival skills capable of overcoming various aggressive creatures and even other players!

name: Dark Door
description: "Dark Door" is a reasoning game developed by the Mallet Games, a studio composed of students from Bilibili.

name: Dangerous Connections
description: As a crisis brews in the Soviet Union, all of your skills as special agent Dan Morris are in demand. Explore the dark machinations of your opponents in a gripping story with exciting and unforgettable characters and use weapons and vehicles typical of the time, as well as a series of spy gadgets.

name: Cursed Sword Edo
description: "HD-2D JRPG" Adam is a soldier who works for Edoward Kingdom. With his best friend Prince Edo, they travel the world to save their King.
