name: Curse of Yggdrasil
description: Curse of Yggdrasil is a challenging 3D action game where you must overcome formidable foes to escape the dimension that holds you captive. Defeating bosses allows you to absorb their souls, enabling you to incarnate them and head into battle utilizing their unique abilities.

name: Crusader's Legacy
description: Bullet Hell, Fantasy, Action-RPG

name: Corti Co.
description: Corti Co is a Science Fiction, Visual novel sandbox. Follow several people involved in a conspiracy surrounding Corti Co, an AI development and research firm.

name: Corrupt Eldritch Order
description: Play as an assassin hired to complete a job in a dark city filled with corrupted beasts. A 2D Action-platformer where each level will test your will, ingenuity, and resourcefulness as you wade through beasts on your journey to complete your job.

name: Core Awaken Rurumu's will
description: To execute her command “Bring Mankind happiness,” Robot Rurumu hopes she can understand the "Happiness of Mankind" by becoming more human-like.

name: Cookthulhu
description: A multi-ending cooking+adventure game.Heed the Oracles,explore the wilderness,gather ingredients, cook and feed, nurture a "monster" exclusive for you. What future will she and the world embrace? All depends on your choices. To eat, or to be eaten, this is a question.

name: Contract Cafe
description: As Riko Feen, you manage a quaint café teetering on the edge of closure. But when a surprising letter arrives, everything shifts—now you must adopt Niya, a girl with a mysterious past. Amidst your efforts to rescue the café and navigate peculiar customers, secrets about the shop begin to surface...

name: Contingency Plan
description: "Contingency Plan" is an action-packed resource management game. Fight, repair, eat, sleep. Race against time to rid your home of the spreading corruption. Each new room presents unique challenges and vital survival tools. Beware, your body isn't what it used to be!

name: Cloud Crashers
description: Fight for victory across airborne stages in Cloud Crashers, an arena platformer fighting game in the skies. Choose from a diverse roster of characters with unique weapons and abilities, and brawl it out against other Challengers in intense PvP action!

name: Click Click Dig: Idle Mine
description: Click Click Dig is a free to play idle mining game that lets you dig deep into the core of several planets. Complete quests, unlock unique character skins, compete in challenges, upgrade planets - the choice is yours!

name: Chemia
description: Chemia is an adventurous survival crafting game played in a post natural disaster scene. This is a project in development state.

name: Chaos Pieces
description: Chaotic board card game with too much freedom

name: Chaos Magus
description: Dive into Chaos Magus, where you blend spellcasting with sword fighting.Craft 200 spells with a intuitive and deeply satisfying magic system.Tackle over 100 unique enemies with strategic combat where every choice matters. Experience an immersive VR adventure like no other!

name: Celestial Rescuers 2: Zero Mission
description: Provide intergalactic humanitarian aid across universes! Fight against space pirates and race against the clock to preserve peace!

name: The Censor
description: Computer genius Yuto Fujimoto finds himself unemployed after graduating college. Wanting an easy life, he gets a job at Facibook as a censor. Editing online content may be boring, but Yuto FLIPS THE WORLD AROUND!

name: Cede
description: A Strategic Action RPG where players transform wastelands into beautiful utopias through combat farming, burst monsters into seeds becoming vegetation.

name: Catwink
description: Catwink is a 3-6 player fast-paced card game that mixes Crazy Eights with Hot Potato. Sabotage your opponents and deflect incoming attacks as you race to get rid of all your cards. Every card triggers an effect that can flip the game on its head!

name: Cardverse
description: Cardverse is a fun card game that will challenge your imagination. Dive into a world filled with unique works of art. Explore with your friends. Simple rules, endless fun, and encouraging creative thinking.

name: Captain Carnage
description: Play as Captain Carnage - a chaotic superhero - and save the world from various supervillains in this exciting genre-mix of Hack and Slash and Third Person Shooter!

name: Bullet Buddies
description: Escape the grasps of death in this top down co-op shooter where two ghost fight to return to their lives!

name: Bullet: Surge
description: Bullet is an electrifying mix of Puzzle and Action! Assume the role of charismatic heroines, each bringing their own flair and unique gameplay to the game. Defeat all Bosses solo or bring the fight online!

name: Bunny Shadow
description: Every step you take influences bunny journey and the outcome of her cursed existence. Will you unravel the mysteries of the past, confronting darkness with courage, or succumb to fear and desperation, sealing her fate in eternal torment?

name: Burgguist
description: With the walking fortress Burggeist at your command, fight back the enemies and build "the Tower."

name: Binary Barrier
description: Defend your AI capital against endless alien invasions in this space shmup-inspired tower defense with roguelite randomness. Dissect bodies and ships to unlock weirdly powerful tech. Upgrade your base with turrets, turning your screen into a symphony of perfect destruction!

name: Bio Prototype 2
description: There are many weirdos in the mysterious underground base, and a great evolution is being written. Activate 50 genetic potentials, transplant 60 mutated organs, and use 200 precise entry codes to create a life form that exceeds the limits of nature.

name: Birdfight
description: birdfight is a game about backyard birds in biplanes brawling in bold and bright battlegrounds to win worms!

name: Black Dungeon
description: Sin descripción

name: Blast 3D The Arrival: Chapter 0
description: Blast 3D The Arrival ~ Chapter 0 ~ Until one day...something of unknown origin came out of this world , a different kind of darkness one that this world has never experienced before... it all happened fast , at the edge of a small island ... where our unsuspecting hero.....

name: Blastgrid
description: Join Sparkle, the adorable protagonist from Technopurge, in BlastGrid! Navigate futuristic mazes, detonate explosive traps, and outsmart VoltMech adversaries in this charming turn-based puzzle game. Uncover the secrets behind the uprising and restore order to the cybernetic realm!

name: Books Upon Books
description: It’s time to turn the page and create the bookshop of your dreams. Customise your Layout. Customise your Colour Scheme. Build bigger and bigger. A casual, simulation game where you get to build and tend to your own bookshop.

name: Bony Bones Adventures
description: Bony Bones Adventures - is a 3D platformer where the lands of Zagrobiya have been enslaved by a necromancer. Help those in need, drive away the invaders, become a hero of Zagrobiya and return its freedom.

name: Boss Rush Delivery
description: Battling beasts and bureaucracy, a newbie mailwoman must deliver a letter of utmost importance to a noble in a neighbouring nation. Shoot, slash, and dash to victory over 8 epic bosses in this fast-paced comedy boss rush action adventure! Delivery or Death!

name: Bonds of Yachiyo
description: At sunset, darkness swallowed everything. Bonds of Yachiyo is a Japanese horror tale of two best friends getting separated in a strange version of their own world. Escape from evil spirits, explore and solve puzzles as you try to unravel the truth and reunite the two friends!

name: Bofyne Unit: The Omega Contract
description: Meet The Bofyne Unit, a special team of western themed cosplayers who boasts of an extremely high success rate for various services such as Body Guarding, Item retrieval, and “Message Sending” Nothing stands in the way of a successful mission, not even laws!

name: Arcanterra
description: Step into the mystical realm of Arcanterra and immerse yourself in a world of adventure! Forge bonds with loyal companions as you traverse through mystical lands. Equip yourself with legendary gear crafted through your journey. Engage in combat, unlock new skills and abilities as you grow stronger.

name: Arcane Treasures: Trading Card Game
description: Build a whimsical deck of cartoon animals to battle foes & uncover special treasures in this cute but competitive online Trading Card Game! Collect trading cards, open booster packs, and complete challenges to expand your collection!

name: Arcade Space Survivor
description: Arcade Space Survivor is a minimal Arcade-Styled Action-Roguelike. Fight against waves of different enemies. Collect Exp to upgrade your spaceship. Arcade Space Survivor offers an innovative and unique gameplay experience in the existing action-roguelike genre.

name: Arbo: Arena Tactics
description: ARBO: Arena Tactics is a sci-fi-themed PvP turn-based tactical strategy/CCG hybrid that pits players in a fast-paced battle of wits and theorycrafting as they command Squads of futuristic Heroes to engage in combat in an interactive hextiled arena.

name: Aquelarre
description: Aquelarre is an historical, immersive, episodic Visual Novel. A narrative-driven game with Charcter development, RPG and Point And Click elements. Travel to a Medieval Spain in which beliefs and superstitions are true. Your decisions will make the legends come to life, influencing the story.

name: Antisuns
description: Antisuns is a turn-based tactics sci-fi roguelike. Board enemy ships (each with an unpredictable interior), supported by your ship's weapons. Guaranteed combat results allow you to counter the enemies' telegraphed actions. Made a mistake? Just rewind, or start a new run with a reshuffled universe!

name: Apocalyptic Shadows
description: This game is set in a fictional post-apocalyptic Western Europe. They must use their wits and skills to survive in dangerous environments. On the road of adventure, players will encounter thrilling moments and feel an unparalleled tension and sense of accomplishment.

name: Ants.io
description: Join Ants.io, where you build an unbeatable ant army, collect power-ups, and battle to become the arena champion! Dive into dynamic action and grow your empire.

name: Ameena: Witchborn Duelist
description: Embark on a dark fantasy quest, navigating procedurally generated realms. Master strategic card duels to avenge your mother against the underworld's greatest demon. Experience a blend of magic, strategy, and deep revenge in this ever-evolving adventure.

name: Absorb Invader
description: Play as alien microorganism and untilize local life to earn DNA and evolve. Absorb smaller cells, feed your cell to grow bigger and purchase upgrades for earned DNA between jumps. Go deeper to find bigger cells and more DNA and food to earn.

name: Jian Xiao Travel
description: it seems that there is an unusual force, pushing him to embark on the long road to cultivate the fairy, he is the son of destiny? Or a lost dog? Or one of the ephemera? What kind of people will he meet? Do what? Figure out that What kind of path? When it's all over, can he start his own life?

name: Hiragana Hero
description:
Learn to read, recognize, and use hiragana as you guide Keen Reflex through a 50-floor labyrinth in an addictive and educational dungeon crawler RPG.
Learning to read [i]hiragana is the first step in your Japanese learning journey and it's the first hurdle that learners struggle to get over.
This addictive RPG dungeon crawler will have you reading Japanese in record time and cut out all that boring study.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Into Madness
description: A free compilation of several previous gameplay ideas in the same vein as FNaF World: Update 2.

name: Paris Belle Epoque
description: A 2.5D adventure game mixing stealth, puzzles and actions in Paris at Belle Epoque. Anna, a young chemist, develops accidentally a murderous formula. Teamed up with her former laboratory rat Spunky, she will have to learn clandestinity, escape from Police to reveal the danger of her discovery!

name: Ava and the Half-World
description: Face a horizon of forgotten myths, sunken relics and mysterious creatures! Fly, shoot and explore your way up the Sidereal Riptide, a dark expanse of water and the cradle of infinite drifting islands.

name: Banana Ranch
description: Banana Ranch is a Boys Love (BL) / Gay dating sim game, mixed with farming and ranch management gameplay aspect. The story follows Ban (changeable name) who suddenly comes to a world with no human.

name: Liar Liar 2
description: A remake of the original Liar Liar 2 with new sprites, backgrounds, story and CGs from guest artists.

name: Skull and Bones: Season 1 - Raging Tides
description: With resource-rich merchant convoys sailing the Indian Ocean, pirates from across the world are driven into a feeding frenzy. Join the fray and face new, powerful enemies including the vicious Plague Lord Phillipe La Peste, Elite Warships, and more. Fight for your share of loot amidst the first season of Skull and Bones, Raging Tides.

name: A Way Up
description: Immerse yourself in the thrilling world of "A Way Up," a fast-paced 2D pixel art platformer created during an intense 72-hour game jam. In this adrenaline-pumping adventure, you start on a precarious platform, only to plummet into the depths of a mysterious cave. Your objective? Ascend to the exit as quickly as possible!

name: Idle Digging Tycoon
description: Welcome to Idle Digging, the ultimate mobile idle game where you become a master digger and embark on an exciting mining adventure! Unearth treasures, rare artifacts, and valuable resources as you dig deeper into the depths of the earth.

name: Board Game Party
description: This is a 3D game integrating various classic board games. Players can engage in online battles, strategize against AI, or enjoy local mode with friends. It offers an immersive gaming experience with realistic graphics and a global leaderboard.

name: Blunder The Sea
description: Use movement and your spear gun to take down underwater baddies. The goal? Treasure of course!

name: Bloodgrounds
description: Delve into roguelike arena combat and city management where core gameplay features strategic battles, town development, and character growth. Command Gladiator units and navigate various mechanics for a comprehensive gaming experience.

name: Ancient Totems
description: Ancient Totems - is a puzzle platformer game in which you have to take control of Totems and return energy to the abandoned temples and pyramids of a vanished civilization. Totems can assemble to combine abilities

name: Anchors: Start
description: Anchors:start is a Cthulhu style 2d shooting game.The game requires players to explore in various maps generated by the program,find and bring back equipment,and live in a base full of doomsday atmosphere.When you explore the map,you see some strange things,calm down.Maybe that's truth!

name: Among The Dead
description: Among the Dead is a turn-based zombie RPG. The player fights against zombies and other enemies and walks around a map from a top-down perspective.

name: Ama's Lullaby
description: Point-and-click (& type) adventure game set in a retro-futuristic world, featuring a command-line based hacking system.

name: Angry Tiny Sun
description: Unleash your dominance in the arena with explosive power-ups, strategic plays, and electrifying combos in our adrenaline-pumping 'Hot-Potato-With-Physics' style combat! Angry Tiny Sun has absolutely zero Pay-To-Win Features!

name: Alchemic Beasts
description: Alchemic Beasts is a monster taming RPG adventure where you breed and transmute creatures using alchemy to forge powerful monsters. Join Zeig, a thrill seeking daredevil, as he harnesses his alchemic beasts to defeat the creature known as the legendary Demon King.

name: A Letter From Mom
description: On the morning of your 14th birthday, you receive a party invitation from your missing mom. The address leads you to a cult village. In this point-and-click puzzle adventure, you play as Nero, a black cat, as you unravel the mysteries behind your mom's disappearance.

name: Algomancy
description: A competitive card game where you draft during gameplay to adapt to your opponent's strategy. Absolutely free to play with no grinding.

name: Alice's World
description: Alice's World is a story-driven 2D adventure puzzle game. Amidst desolate ruins and deserted cities in a world filled with death, the young girl Alice hears "your" voice from in front of the screen. You must guide her forward, solve the mysteries, and reach the top of the tower.

name: Alpha Nomos
description: Hack, slash and feel the beat in this rhythm based action rougelite! Help Cello and her gang escape a musically driven, murderous puppet filled world that is as dangerous as it is groovy!

name: All Knowledge Authority
description: Be part of the All Knowledge Authority, and go in search of those forgotten mysteries in the corners of the world. Discover the secrets that forces that will surprise you want to hide. Go out in search of your destiny, that which unites the present, the past and the future.

name: AirFlow: Sky Is The Limit
description: The sky is to becomes your battleground! Prepare to embark on adrenaline-fueled adventures in epic aerial combat like never before. In AirFlow, you'll pilot airplanes in intense sky and land battles, mastering the art of dodging enemy fire, to claim dominance over the skies and land.

name: Agama Versus Bugs
description: Meet the ever-hungry bearded dragon. However, in pursuit of her next meal, she must watch out for various traps and obstacles lurking in the terrarium. Who will win in this adventure? an ever-hungry lizard or crunchy bugs?

name: Age of the Deep
description: Age of the Deep is a mermaid fashion looter rpg. Explore the beautiful, and terrifying, mysteries of the ocean surrounding the islands, fight off pirates that threaten the inhabitants, dive deep to uncover mysteries and equip the latest in swimwear to boost your stats.

name: Aeronesia
description: Aeronesia is a non-linear platform RPG with emphasis on exploration, combat, dialogue and quest-based progression. After an accident transports you and hundreds of other people into an alien world, it's up to you to find a way to survive and discover some means of getting back home.

name: Trash Can Tactics
description: Ever since the Nature's Legacy Institute has opened their doors to all, there have been an odd string of thefts - not of rare artifacts, but rather of the food from the cafeteria. Play as either a museum staff member, or an intelligent raccoon, in this asymmetrical PvP heist game.

name: Speedy 500
description: Speedy 500 isn’t just a race; it’s a quest for immortality. Strap in, rev those engines, and chase the chequered flag. The countdown begins—500 miles await!

name: Bennys Backrooms
description: Work together with your friends (or betray them) to find multiple exits in the Backrooms. Expect to see the "You Died" screen a lot.

name: Tinycraft
description: Demons from another world are coming, leading the allied forces of the Six Races to resist them. Choose your hero, build and continuously strengthen your team, and enjoy the collision of traditional RTS and Rogue mechanics in this world of sword and magic!

name: Musgro Farm
description: Plant crops, combine them intro recipes, and distribute them for sale in this incremental factory game. Optimize your layouts and reinvest in your infrastructure to maximize your output. Gain experience to unlock new technologies and expand your ever-growing farm.

name: Don't Kill Them All
description: Build your Orc clan and lead them on a journey of self-discovery and mindfulness in a unique blend of turn-based strategy and base-building. Venture into different regions and carefully navigate encounters while ensuring there’s something left on the battlefield for you to take home.

name: Casino World
description: Casino World is a massively multiplayer casino RPG that provides the deepest, most satisfying casino experience around. Compete in season challenges, enjoy live parties, try amazing avatars, dance moves, and so much MORE!

name: Pyrrhic Paradise: Dissemble
description: Pyrrhic Paradise: Dissemble is a story focused action RPG that gives you the choice to build out the narrative, or destroy it.

name: Sumo
description: Fight up to 7 other players to try and be the last one in the ring in this arcade-inspired fighting game. Customize your character with hundreds of combinations of cosmetics. Tired of fighting? Fish with friends to unlock special fishing cosmetics!

name: Fix This House
description: Immerse yourself in a relaxing and minimalist puzzle game where your task is to fix the building using a variety of blocks. Enjoy the interactive environment, soothing music, and sounds of nature. Solve puzzles, explore the world, and take your time!

name: Sea of Brave: Beast Island
description: Explore a unique island, find allies, and defeat the fearsome minions of Captain Kingg, in this new Sea of Brave adventure, a turn-based, single-player, deck-building, strategy roguelike. Don't let them capture you!

name: Moving On
description: Follow Addison as they help their recently-deceased mother move on to the Spirit World. In this 2D visual narrative and platformer, Addison must explore and find special objects while being confronted with a journey of grief.

name: Vertig8
description: In Vertig8, explore a vertical world unlike any other. Ascend through a skyscraper, engaging in strategic gameplay and exhilarating action. Join internet celebrities in this unique multiplayer experience. Experience Vertigo and redefine your gaming adventure.

name: Rana Neida
description: Figure out why Winter is angry and save Spring in Rana Neida. A Cute metroidvania platformer where you play as the aspect of Spring.

name: Mysterious Voyage: Set sail
description: Here, you can freely sail your ship, explore the endless ocean, and find hidden islands and treasures!

name: Farm Enough
description: Is it enough farm to advance? Farm Enough: Roguelike is a strategic farming roguelike where you craft, build, gather, and manage in order to earn money for the increasing rent.

name: Undead Kingdom Survivors
description: Prepare to face the relentless onslaught of the undead! Clear the undead realm either solo or with up to 2 friends in online multiplayer. Choose powerful abilities to vanquish hordes of undead. Upgrade stats and unlock new heroes as you strive for survival in this intense roguelite bullet hell.

name: Reflection Link
description: Seven sinners awaken within the Moirae facility, where a mysterious figure informs them that the path to freedom will open only when they confess. Explore with escape room style puzzles, lead discussions, and uncover the secrets they desperately wish to hide in this branching path visual novel.

name: Monster Hero
description: Monster Hero is an adventure RPG blending companion gameplay with challenging puzzles, intense boss fights, and a heart-felt story between humans and monsters.

name: Earthborne
description: Explore, fight, craft and develop an automated technological civilization complete with airships and robotic drones!

name: Fishing Fishing
description: Fishing Fishing is a first person fishing simulation role-playing game where you will travel to multiple provinces in China, experience different scenery and cuisine, and use a variety of fishing gear to fight against big fish.

name: Water: Transformer
description: This is a platform jumping game, you can obtain different abilities by transforming between solid, liquid, and steam three forms, thus crossing obstacles and solving puzzles. The workshop allows you design and share their own created maps with the players all around the world.

name: Robert on Earth
description: Running a special underground farm in the distant and desolate future, exploring various crop abilities. Mining, fishing, meeting new robot friends, discovering new unknown areas, and exploring the truth that belongs to you

name: Minecraft: Star Wars Classic Skin Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Rolling Lee
description: A game where you control a rolling ball named Lee!

name: Anothereal
description: Accompany Astra as she discovers the world outside her solitude and uncovers the mysteries of the Real. Engage in shmup-style combat encounters to leave an impact and fight back against the ones who would challenge her EXISTENCE.

name: Strange Antiquities
description: Become the custodian of a store dealing in occult antiquities. Explore the quaint and gloomy town of Undermere, where strange goings-on and dark mysteries abound. Find and identify arcane artefacts, use your collection to aid the townsfolk with their unusual problems — and remember to pet your cat!

name: Destiny of Heroes
description: Destiny of Heroes is a twin-stick, squad-based shooter set in occupied Indonesia at the end of World War II. Fighting Dutch and Japanese colonizers, you will lead the struggle for independence, in a heroic struggle against foreign tyrants. Liberty or death!

name: Nightmare Operator
description: NIGHTMARE OPERATOR is an action horror shooter about hunting Youkai in the haunted ruins of Tokyo. Combat fuses the tense, shooting gameplay of classic survival horror, with the skill-based mechanics and execution of fighting games and spectacle fighters.

name: 18Trip
description: Taking place in future Yokohama, the HAMA 18 district, once a dominating "Independent Special Tourism Zone", finds itself in decline. The protagonist, along with their childhood friend and newly appointed mayor of HAMA 0, Kafka Oguro, embarks on the journey to return the tourism sector to its former glory.

name: Mom's Tent
description:
Your mother who owns a small tent had to go to town quickly to solve some problems and you had to take care of your shop while she was away.

In that time many things can happen, so be careful and pay attention to the details.

the game can end in three different ways

name: RewindGirl
description: Running, jumping, rewinding— A time-leap action puzzle where you cooperate with your past self!

name: Ms. Pac-Man Returns
description: Sin descripción

name: Haunted Paws
description: Haunted Paws is a Cozy Coop Horror game where you will play as two Puppies trying to rescue their human friend in a haunted mansion. Create your puppy, explore spooky environments and defeat evil creatures in an action packed adventure!

name: Intonight
description: In "Intonight" dive into an emotional journey under dazzling neon lights, where love collides with betrayal. Witnessing your girlfriend's infidelity at a nightclub shatters your world, pushing you to seek a fresh start amidst nightlife's temptations and challenges.

name: The Last Match Girl
description: Finding the Place to Return, A survival horror of ashes and light. In a city where the dawn never comes, Scavenging for food, scavenging for life, And yet you are still alive. ………"Welcome home."

name: Anachron
description: Anachron is a first-person, escape room-styled, single-player puzzle game set in the far future of 2080. You play as a survivor who woke up from a catastrophe find a way to escape from the space station before it gets worse.

name: Looping Art Museum
description: "Looping Art Museum" is a single-player adventure game where you wander through an infinitely-looping art museum, finding changes in the paintings to progress. Interact with a talking "Mr.Cat" and uncover the mysteries of the strange art museum.

name: Outlaw Squadron
description: Outlaw Squadron is a turn-based air combat game with roguelike and card battler elements. Train your pilots, upgrade airplanes and build a legendary squadron to defeat your enemies.

name: Slayscape
description: Slayscape combines a fantasy battle royale roguelike with player-customizable, procedurally-generated dungeons. Merges RPG session-based progression and skilled first-person PvPvE gameplay. Forge alliances, control monsters upon death, and seek revenge in this dynamic, session-based adventure.

name: Nora: the Hidden Object Challenge
description: Help Nora find the missing items around her house! Try the regular difficulty mode as well as shadows and dark mode.

name: Moto Rush Reborn
description: Feel the pulse of retro-futuristic Tokyo veins urging you to go faster, drawing you deeper. Surrender to the speed, let the thrill consume your essence. Each surge, each flicker of light, is your path to glory or oblivion in 'Moto Rush Reborn'. Is your soul worth this speed?

name: Species: Unknown
description: Species: Unknown is a first-person shooter in co-op set in a horror atmosphere. Sent on a mission aboard a devastated spaceship, you must identify and annihilate a terrifying threat through strategic collaboration with your teammates and the tools at your disposal.

name: Sarah: Story of a Young Thief
description: In this point & click puzzle-adventure novel, Sara has been betrayed by criminals and now must solve numerous puzzles to find her stolen money. Join her on her thrilling journey, help her decipher clues, and face the criminals!

name: Sonic 3D Snowboarding
description: Sin descripción

name: InSight
description: InSight is an arcade survival horror game where you can look through the eyes of the monster! Use this to your advantage! The monster's point of view can help you check your corners, see if you are being chased, and find hidden objects!

name: Every Hue of You
description: Every Hue of You follows the deeply personal and thoughtful journey of Twyla: A jeweller battling grief who awakens the power to enchant her creations with the energy of emotions.

name: Countryballs: The Heist
description: Countryballs: The Heist is PWA's comedic stealth adventure where you become a master thief for eccentric clients. Customise your Countryball's disguise to explore maze-like countries. Plan, sabotage, hide and trick to outwit guards and traps - or create your own thrilling heists for the community.

name: Nutz Revenge
description: Embark on a nutty adventure in this action-packed 2D platformer! Join Pete & Penny Peanut, Sgt Acorn, Walter Walnut, and Peggy Pistachio as they team up to enact their revenge upon the evil rodent gang. With vibrant visuals and a world full of collectables, prepare for a nutty journey like no other!

name: Moon 2999
description: Moon 2999 is a RPG game about Units & resources management, single-player or co-op action missions game set in a lunar base and its nearby space environment.

name: Puppet: Hide And Seek
description: Puppet: Hide And Seek - is a 7 vs 1 multiplayer horror game where one player takes on the role of a brutal Killer and seven other players are Survivors trying to escape from the killer.

name: Fearless
description: Dive into Fearless, a thrilling single-player zombie shooter. Navigate through an island overrun by the undead to rescue your sister. Are you "Fearless" enough to face the hordes and emerge victorious? Embark on the adventure today!

name: From Fire Emergence
description: Survive unspeakable nightmares in this third person action-horror. Play as Sergeant Aaron as he answers a distressed call for help deep in the British countryside.Defeat vile demons, solve puzzles, explore & progress in an unrivalled, atmospheric world, whose events, will have you gripped with fear.

name: Monster: Titan's Playground
description: Devastate a fully-destructible city in VR as a giant monster. Battle mechs using your various breath, ranged, and melee weapons—including fire breath, gravity cannon, and lock-on missile pods.

name: Rising Army
description: A strategy camp sim game where you manage and command your army, training each individual troop and upgrading your camp. Satisfy your King by completing missions and epic battles against enemies. Lead your Lord to legend!

name: The Era of Pioneers
description: "The Era of Pioneers" is a combination of simulation operation, RPG, turn-based, card-type, Rougelite indie, covering agriculture, farming, business management and many other aspects. Players experience their lives by playing as various characters.

name: Songs of Conquest: Rise Eternal
description: Embrace the darkness in your endeavor to crush the Stouthearts. Raise the dead to serve once more. For the scholars of Loth know that death is not the end, it is merely the beginning.

name: Lunar Resilience
description: Lunar Resilience – Survive the werewolves, build your fortress, craft items and weaponry, hunt animals, feed yourself, hydrate yourself and stay resilient.Explore and uncover the island’s mysteries. If you're afraid to go alone, feel free to invite your friends to go with you.

name: Alchemy Mastery
description: A game where you take part in an immersive chemical laboratory simulation. Produce various mixtures using equipment and substances. Use mostly mouse controls to pour chemicals from vessel to vessel.

name: Land of Symbiosis
description: Online cooperative or solo survival and action RPG set in a procedural alien world. Explore, survive, battle bosses and gather resources to customize your equipment and defend your bases from creatures drawn by the electromagnetism of your technology.

name: Anubis
description: Anubis, the god of the underworld, received order from God Ra. The army of the desert god Seth, who became stronger, invaded the ancient world. To stop Seth, Anubis will capture the desert fire and destroy Seth's army.

name: Planet Prospector
description: An open World Space Logistics Simulator set in the future where humanity have just started the BIG colonization effort of a new found world. experience seamless space to planet flight. Manage fuel economy and jump ranges as you fly across fully scaled planets and moons delivering cargo.

name: Mountain Boy
description: Ascend to new heights and conquer all the peaks in the world of Mountain Boy!

name: Horrible Dream
description: You find yourself in an abandoned military town, from which all its inhabitants have disappeared due to unexplained circumstances. You will need to find out what happened, but unexplained phenomena will occur during the investigation. This journey will change the main character forever.

name: Aikyam
description: Dazzle the hearts of disgruntled villagers with extravagant turn-based battles and rally them against demons in this Bollywood-inspired fantasy RPG!

name: Split Decision
description: Morals meet profits in Split Decision, where you play as a boxing judge who tries to move up in the world of sports, corruption and bribery.

name: SongBird: FlingAThing
description: A unique, stylish platformer based around flinging yourself as fast as possible in any direction. Venture deep into the "Songbird Short Stop" to fix a cash register that won't scan milk in this exhilarating precision platformer.

name: Foul
description: Foul is a survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Fight off the infected. Gather loot to survive. Explore various locations. Try to survive in this harsh environment for as long as you can!

name: Rastignac The Homeless
description: "Rastignac The Homeless" plunges you into a survival horror nightmare in an urban city overrun by zombies. Scavenge, fight, and drive your way through the quarantine zone to escape. Every move could be your last in this gripping tale of desperation and survival.

name: HyperFantasy Mimesis
description: Deconstruction of an RPG. Monsters are gone. Humanity doesn't want to be saved. Your biggest enemy will be the UI.

name: Pantless
description: Pantless brings a hilarious twist to the rage-inducing game genre inspired by Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy. In this third-person, physics-based game, players control customizable characters hilariously devoid of pants, navigating through chaotic and fun challenges.

name: Pimic of Sorrow
description: "The Magic Mirror will destroy the world... Someone has told the Ice Queen the whereabouts of the Magic Mirror." Embark on a mysterious journey to save the Magic Mirror from the Ice Queen. An RPG woven with poetic storytelling and fairy tale-style pixel art graphics.

name: The Remake of the End of the Greatest RPG of All Time
description: The Remake of the End of the Greatest RPG of All Time is the last hour of a lost (nonexistent) JRPG, "remade” in 3D pixel art complete with director’s commentary, the digital manual, and archival footage.

name: Hard Void
description: Lead your space-faring species across galaxies and multiple dimensions to build an Empire in this strategy game. Design your spaceships, assemble your fleets and fight for the supremacy. Colonize planets, asteroids and the space itself! but beware, you aren't only dealing with just other species.

name: Touhou Scarlet Diabolique Fantastica
description: Touhou Scarlet Diabolique Fantastica brings the popular Japanese Touhou series back to arcades worldwide in a remake of Embodiment of Scarlet Devil (Touhou Episode 6).

name: Rustwing
description: Rustwing is a twin stick shooter rougelike, where you play as a mercenary spaceship sent on a journey across the habited space. Navigate from star to star, battle the scattered factions of humanity, customize your weaponry, acquire powerful upgrades and become a legendary pilot!

name: Floink Yoink
description: Embark on an endless journey through the fiery skies in "Floink Yoink", where the only goal is to reach the highest score imaginable! Take control of a brave pig with wings as you navigate an ever-changing landscape of flaming pipes, each flap bringing you closer to become crispy bacon!

name: Slum Dweller
description: Slum Dweller is a physics-based fighting game about typical situations that slum dwellers encounters on a daily basis. Try on the role of a slum dweller trying to survive in a harsh criminal environment or a street fighter taking part in underground tournaments.

name: Habitants
description: Habitants is an open-world survival game for 1-8 players. Set on a tumultuous planet, players must contend with mysterious alien races, survive in the midst of powerful factions vying for dominance, and build your own base through construction, combat, and strategy.

name: Colonies of The Remnant
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, found and develop your own colony under the threat of the undead. Be cautious against enemy colonies or form alliances. Engage in action-fueled battles against the undead and other humans using FPS or TPS game modes. Formulate your strategy and survive!

name: Catonium: Out of Chaos
description: Unravel the mysteries of Catonium, a medieval fantasy world on the brink of chaos. In the wake of "The Fall," a cataclysmic event that shattered the realm a decade ago. Ancient ruins, cities, and vast landscapes await your exploration. Forge your path, uncover secrets, and shape the future.

name: Dance Junkie
description: Dance Junkie is a full body Rhythm Smasher game that turns your webcam or smartphone into a motion capture system. Experience full body tracking without expensive equipment while you move your body in an immersive world. Your goal is to pop tune bubbles, and you'll need rhythm to be successful.

name: Rine: The Trail of Fireflies
description: Embark yourself in a journey about light, fireflies and a cute little blue fox. Help Rine befriend the fireflies along the way. They will guide him to solve the mystery of the missing light.

name: Nox Machina
description: Pilot a lone ship through the moon's core to shut down a lunar doomsday factory in this sci-fi deckbuilding game. Power up your cards and equipment to neutralize humanity's greatest threat... if you can survive the journey.

name: Echoes of Extinction
description: Open World Prehistoric Horror Survival set on a mysterious island inhabited by dinosaurs and tribal humans. Survival is a test of resilience and adaptability. Players must carve their path in this challenging world, competing for territory, resources and ultimately, their own survival.

name: Clawpunk
description: Clawpunk is a challenging, fast-paced, melee 2D action game with roguelite elements and multiple characters, where the player can run rampant in a destructible environment that rewards a reactive and aggressive play style.

name: Sands of Supremacy
description: Sands of Supremacy is a singleplayer, side-scrolling strategy/resource management hybrid 2D game set in a desert landscape on an unknown, futuristic planet. The game combines survival, strategy, and resource management elements to create a challenging and engaging gameplay experience.

name: Mahjong Musou: Former Army
description: Immerse yourself in the Japanese mahjong experience with the original theme of the Three Kingdoms second dimension! Establish a deep bond with the famous heroes of the Three Kingdoms and enjoy rich voice interactions. Challenge players around the world to enjoy Mahjong fun.

name: Minna no Mozoo
description: MOZOO for Everyone is a short game that serves as a technology showcase of the latest 3D model generation AI. The enigmatic creature, MOZOO, changes its form in response to the words it learns, morphing accordingly. Join in the fun with the transformed MOZOOs in a 3D stacking puzzle game!

name: Ponolf
description: Sad news for you. There is a fool in here. Ponolf is a multiplayer deductive game with max 12 players. Create quizzes, answer them, and discuss about the some of them to deduce who got it wrong. Is your weapon Knowledge or Strength? Well, let's start the meeting of tonight.

name: CurseBreaker
description: Trapped in this forest cursed by dark magic, you task is to seal the dark powers within these monsters and recruit them to fight for you. You must tactically wield your magic, break curses, gather monster allies, and continually strengthen your squad to survive in this cursed forest.

name: Q-j-civilization-s
description: The combination of classic gameplay and the wonderful collision with history. A light rouge, experience the fun of civilization!

name: Eternal-Time-Love
description: Eternal-Time-Love is a unique blend of turn-based and real-time strategy, with simplified yet tactical gameplay; Rich science fiction story, special level design, simple high-contrast style, support for multilingual and classical music

name: Fallen Castle
description: A real-time strategy, tower defense, and base-building game where physics based 2D blocks influence the course of grand battles and the construction of strategic fortresses.

name: One Way Lane
description: Riley faces the adjustment of entering adulthood. But in order to establish a happy future she must first face what is haunting her in the past. Will you get lost in wonderland or come out a new you?

name: Floor 10 Anomaly
description: Something lurks on the 10th floor of Hotel Fleur-De-Lys. Anyone trying to reach floor 10 is unable to. As if the hotel was trying to prevent the guests from reaching it. The hallways keep repeating themselves, only subtle signs are your clue forward to discover what lies ahead.

name: Eye of the Summoner
description: You are the Eye of the Summoner. Protect your tower from the fiendish hordes of paladins attempting to destroy it. Summon your beloved creatures of the darkness and fight to keep the flame of your beacon alive for as long as possible.

name: Super Mario Sunshine 64
description: A 2D web browser game which uses aspects of Super Mario 64 and Super Mario Sunshine.

name: Other Super Mario Bros. U
description: Sin descripción

name: Air Tennis
description: Fan game based on the visual novel Air developed by Key.

name: Super Flash Mario Bros.
description: A game for web browsers where the player must complete 5 levels as Mario or Luigi, the only power ups are mushrooms.

name: Space Base
description:
Space Base is an action-packed tower defence game, where you aim to protect your planets from the incoming forces of enemy ships and aliens by any means necessary. Build up your defences as stronger and stronger waves of enemies arrive to reach the highest score possible.

In space base, your ever growing arsenal of towers will give you a large variety of playstyles, allowing for the player to decide what they want to go into every battle with. Alongside this, a choice of different planets, difficulties, and fun unique game-modes keep the player on their toes, making every game unique and different for a fun experience.

The game is constantly evolving, with new content being added all the time, so every time you come back there are new challenges to face with new forces to put against them. Do all you can to unlock everything and become the best space warrior you can be.

name: Pet Cemetery
description: In the quiet woods of Illinois, a regular guy's peaceful country life takes a sinister turn after an accidental death sets off a bizarre chain of events. As he navigates the mysterious consequences, the secrets of the woods slowly unravel, revealing an eerie connection between lives. Brace yourself for a journey into the heart of rural Illinois, where a single mistake leads to a chilling and enigmatic tale that blurs the line between life and death.

name: The Earl Street Massacre
description:
Working in an abusive work environment is quite tiring, especially for a chronic workaholic. But at the end of the day, your cozy little home and your loving wife awaits. Well... Most times they do. Follow Thomas Grey, as he gets home after a long day of work at the office. Ready for nothing more then to rest and prepare for the next tiring day back at the office, he goes through his usual nightly routine. Unfortunatly for him, someone else already has different plans for him....

'The Earl Street Massacre' is a short horror game, with simple, pixelated graphics. As mentioned above, you follow Thomas Grey, going through his nightly routine, his night getting progressively worse every passing second.
